English Sentences: And he shall take of the blood of the bullock, and sprinkle it with his finger upon the mercy seat eastward; and before the mercy seat shall he sprinkle of the blood with his finger seven times.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi he mirgguwaa suuttaappe guuttaa ekkidi, ba giddo biradhdhiyaa an naaqqidi, atto giyo sohuwaa qum77uwau sintta baggaa caccafo; qassi atto giyo sohuwaa qum77uwaappe sintta baggaara de7iya sohuwaakka laapputoo caccafo.

English Sentences: Then shall he kill the goat of the sin offering, that is for the people, and bring his blood within the vail, and do with that blood as he did with the blood of the bullock, and sprinkle it upon the mercy seat, and before the mercy seat:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan asaa nagaraa yarshshuwaassi gidiya deeshshaa shukkidi, a suuttaa magalashuwaa giddo eho; ehiidi mirgguwaa suuttaa caccafidoogaadan, atto giyo sohuwaa qum77uwaa sinttaanne atto giyo sohuwaa qum77uwaappe sintta baggaara de7iya sohuwaa caccafo.

English Sentences: And he shall make an atonement for the holy place, because of the uncleanness of the children of Israel, and because of their transgressions in all their sins: and so shall he do for the tabernacle of the congregation, that remaineth among them in the midst of their uncleanness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi Ubbaappe Aadhdhida Geeshsha Sohuwaa Israa7eela asaa tunatettaappenne nagaraappe geeshshees. Qassi eti tunabaa oottishin, eta giddon de7iya Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaakka hegaadan oottidi geeshsho.

English Sentences: And there shall be no man in the tabernacle of the congregation when he goeth in to make an atonement in the holy place, until he come out, and have made an atonement for himself, and for his household, and for all the congregation of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Ubbaappe Aadhdhida Geeshsha Sohuwaa gelidi, ba nagaraa, ba so asaa nagaraanne kumetta Israa7eela asaa nagaraa atto giissidi kiyana gakkanaashin, ooninne Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa giddon de7oppo.

English Sentences: And he shall go out unto the altar that is before the LORD, and make an atonement for it; and shall take of the blood of the bullock, and of the blood of the goat, and put it upon the horns of the altar round about.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan i GODAA sinttan de7iya yarshshiyoosaa kiyidi a geeshsho. Korimaa suuttaappenne deeshshaa suuttaappe guuttaa guuttaa ekkidi, yarshshiyoosaa yuushuwan de7iya kaceta tiyo.

English Sentences: And he shall sprinkle of the blood upon it with his finger seven times, and cleanse it, and hallow it from the uncleanness of the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi he suuttaappe guuttaa ba biradhdhiyan ekkidi, laapputoo caccafidi, Israa7eela asaa tunatettaappe he yarshshosaa geeshsho.

English Sentences: And when he hath made an end of reconciling the holy place, and the tabernacle of the congregation, and the altar, he shall bring the live goat:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aarooni Ubbaappe Aadhdhida Geeshsha Sohuwaa, Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaanne yarshshiyoosaa geeshshiyo wogaa polidoogaappe guyyiyan, paxa de7iya deeshshaa shiishsho.

English Sentences: And Aaron shall lay both his hands upon the head of the live goat, and confess over him all the iniquities of the children of Israel, and all their transgressions in all their sins, putting them upon the head of the goat, and shall send him away by the hand of a fit man into the wilderness:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiishshidi Aarooni ba naa77u kusheta paxa de7iya deeshshaa huuphiyan wottidi, Israa7eela asaa naaquwaa ubbaa, eta makkala ubbaa, eta nagara ubbaa paaxo; yaatidi he deeshshaa huuphiyan hegaa toosso; toossidi he deeshshaa efaanaadan giigissido asa bollan bazzo yeddo.

English Sentences: And the goat shall bear upon him all their iniquities unto a land not inhabited: and he shall let go the goat in the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: I deeshshaa bazzo yeddin, deeshshai eta nagara ubbaa tookkidi, asi bainna sohuwaa bazzo bo.

English Sentences: And Aaron shall come into the tabernacle of the congregation, and shall put off the linen garments, which he put on when he went into the holy place, and shall leave them there:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan, Aarooni Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa bo; biidi Ubbaappe Aadhdhida Geeshsha Sohuwaa gelido wode, kase ba maayido liinuwaappe oosettida maayuwaa qaaridi hegan wotto.

English Sentences: And he shall wash his flesh with water in the holy place, and put on his garments, and come forth, and offer his burnt offering, and the burnt offering of the people, and make an atonement for himself, and for the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeshsha sohuwan i ba bollaa haattan meecettidi, hara maayuwaa maayidi kiyo; yaatidi xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa baagaanne asaagaa yarshshidi, ba nagaraanne asaa nagaraa atto giissees.

English Sentences: And the fat of the sin offering shall he burn upon the altar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi hegaadankka nagaraa yarshshuwaa handdaa yarshshiyoosaa bollan wottidi xuuggo.

English Sentences: And he that let go the goat for the scapegoat shall wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in water, and afterward come into the camp.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Bazzo yeddiyo deeshshaa efiida bitaneekka ba maayuwaa meecco; ba bollaakka haattan meecetto. Yaati simmidi dunkkaanidosaa yo.

English Sentences: And the bullock for the sin offering, and the goat for the sin offering, whose blood was brought in to make atonement in the holy place, shall one carry forth without the camp; and they shall burn in the fire their skins, and their flesh, and their dung.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nagaraa atto giissanau Aarooni Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwaa gelido wode, nagaraa yarshshuwaa mirgguwaa suuttaanne deeshshaa suuttaa ekkidi geliis; ha77i intte he mirgguwaanne he deeshshaanne dunkkaanidosaappe gaxi kessite. Kessidi eta galbbaa, eta ashuwaanne eta tociyaa taman xuuggite.

English Sentences: And he that burneth them shall wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in water, and afterward he shall come into the camp.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa taman xuuggida bitanee ba maayuwaa meecco; ba bollaakka haattan meecetto; Hegaappe guyyiyan, dunkkaanidosaa yo.

English Sentences: And this shall be a statute for ever unto you: that in the seventh month, on the tenth day of the month, ye shall afflict your souls, and do no work at all, whether it be one of your own country, or a stranger that sojourneth among you:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hagee intteyyo merinaukka woga gido: laappuntta aginai gelido tammantta gallassan intte huuphiyaa kaushshite; Israa7eela asaa gidin woi qassi intte giddon de7iya hara biitta asa gidinkka, ai oosonne oottoppite.

English Sentences: For on that day shall the priest make an atonement for you, to cleanse you, that ye may be clean from all your sins before the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, inttena geeshshanau, intte nagaraa atto giissiyo gallassai he gallassa. Inttekka GODAA sinttan intte nagara ubbaappe geeyana.

English Sentences: It shall be a sabbath of rest unto you, and ye shall afflict your souls, by a statute for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee intte waanna shemppuwaa shemppiyo sambbata gallassa. He gallassan intte huuphiyaa kaushshite; hegee intteyyo merinaukka woga gido.

English Sentences: And the priest, whom he shall anoint, and whom he shall consecrate to minister in the priest's office in his father's stead, shall make the atonement, and shall put on the linen clothes, even the holy garments:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi ba aawaa sohuwan qeese gidanaadan tiyettiyaanne dummatiya asi geeshsha gidida liinuwaappe dadettida maayuwaa maayidi, nagaraa atto giissiyo wogaa polo.

English Sentences: And he shall make an atonement for the holy sanctuary, and he shall make an atonement for the tabernacle of the congregation, and for the altar, and he shall make an atonement for the priests, and for all the people of the congregation.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwaa, Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa, yarshshiyoosaa, qeesetanne Israa7eela asaa ubbaa geeshsho.

English Sentences: And this shall be an everlasting statute unto you, to make an atonement for the children of Israel for all their sins once a year. And he did as the LORD commanded Moses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaa nagaraa ubbaa atto giissiyo wogaa intte laittan laittan issitoo oottanaadan, hagee intteyyo merinaukka woga gido" yaagiis. Yaagin Muusee GODAI azazidoogaadan oottiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Speak unto Aaron, and unto his sons, and unto all the children of Israel, and say unto them; This is the thing which the LORD hath commanded, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aaroonassi a attuma naatussinne Israa7eela asa ubbaassi hagaadan yaagada oda; GODAI azazidoogee hagaa:

English Sentences: What man soever there be of the house of Israel, that killeth an ox, or lamb, or goat, in the camp, or that killeth it out of the camp,
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaappe ooninne boora woi dorssa woi deeshsha dunkkaanidosan woi dunkkaanidosaappe gaxaara shukkidi,

English Sentences: And bringeth it not unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, to offer an offering unto the LORD before the tabernacle of the LORD; blood shall be imputed unto that man; he hath shed blood; and that man shall be cut off from among his people:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI imota oottidi immanau Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa pengge GODAA sintti ehaana xayikko, he suuttan i oishettees; he asi suuttaa gussiis. Hegaa gishshau i ba asaa giddoppe bohetto.

English Sentences: To the end that the children of Israel may bring their sacrifices, which they offer in the open field, even that they may bring them unto the LORD, unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, unto the priest, and offer them for peace offerings unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Israa7eela asai bantta yarshshuwaa mehiyaa coo dembban shukkiyoogaa aggidi, haa GODAAKKO, Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa penggen de7iya qeesiyaakko ehoona. Ehin qeesee hegaa ekkidi, GODAASSI issippetettaa yarshsho oottidi shukko.

English Sentences: And the priest shall sprinkle the blood upon the altar of the LORD at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and burn the fat for a sweet savour unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi qeesee Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa penggen de7iya GODAAYYO yarshshiyoosaa bollan he suuttaa caccafo; handdaakka GODAAYYO sawuwaa tonggu giya yarshsho oottidi xuuggo.

English Sentences: And they shall no more offer their sacrifices unto devils, after whom they have gone a whoring. This shall be a statute for ever unto them throughout their generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai GODAA kaalliyoogaa aggidi kaallido daidanttatuyyo naa77antto bantta yarshshuwaa yarshshoppona. Hagee etayyoonne yiya yeleta ubbaayyo merinau woga gido yaaga.

English Sentences: And thou shalt say unto them, Whatsoever man there be of the house of Israel, or of the strangers which sojourn among you, that offereth a burnt offering or sacrifice,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eta hagaadan yaaga; Israa7eela asaappe gidin woi eta giddon de7iya hara biitta asappe gidinkka, ooninne xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa woi hara yarshshuwaa shiishshiyo wode,

English Sentences: And bringeth it not unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, to offer it unto the LORD; even that man shall be cut off from among his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI yarshshanau Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa pengge ehaana xayikko, he asi ba asaa giddoppe bohetto.

English Sentences: And whatsoever man there be of the house of Israel, or of the strangers that sojourn among you, that eateth any manner of blood; I will even set my face against that soul that eateth blood, and will cut him off from among his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asaappe woikko eta giddon de7iya hara biitta asaappe ooninne suutta miikko, he suuttaa miya asa bollan taani ta sinttaa tukkana; taani he bitaniyaa asaa giddon bohana.

English Sentences: For the life of the flesh is in the blood: and I have given it to you upon the altar to make an atonement for your souls: for it is the blood that maketh an atonement for the soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko asho maayida ubbaa de7oi a suuttaa giddon de7ees; suuttaikka qassi de7oi a giddon de7iyoogaappe denddidaagan nagaraa atto giissiyaagaa gidiyo gishshau, intte nagaraa atto giissanaadan, taani intteyyo yarshshiyoosaa bollan yarshshanaadan immaas.

English Sentences: Therefore I said unto the children of Israel, No soul of you shall eat blood, neither shall any stranger that sojourneth among you eat blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau taani Israa7eela asaa, "Intteppe woikko intte giddon de7iya hara biittaa asaappe ooninne suutta mooppo" yaagaas.

English Sentences: And whatsoever man there be of the children of Israel, or of the strangers that sojourn among you, which hunteth and catcheth any beast or fowl that may be eaten; he shall even pour out the blood thereof, and cover it with dust.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asaappe woikko eta giddon de7iya hara biittaa asaappe ooninne miyo do7a woi kafo shankkatidi worikko, a suuttaa sa7an gussidi, biittaa kammo.

English Sentences: For it is the life of all flesh; the blood of it is for the life thereof: therefore I said unto the children of Israel, Ye shall eat the blood of no manner of flesh: for the life of all flesh is the blood thereof: whosoever eateth it shall be cut off.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko asho maayida ubbaa de7oi a suuttaa giddoona. Hegaa gishshau taani Israa7eela asaa, "Asho maayida meretaa ubbaa de7oikka a suuttaa giddon de7iyo gishshau, suuttaa mooppite; qassi miya ooninne ba asaa giddoppe bohetto" yaagaas.

English Sentences: And every soul that eateth that which died of itself, or that which was torn with beasts, whether it be one of your own country, or a stranger, he shall both wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even: then shall he be clean.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asa gidin woikko eta giddon de7iya hara biitta asa gidin, ooninne bauta woi do7i oiqqidi woridobaa ashuwaa miikko, ba maayuwaa meecco; ba bollaakka meecetto; yaatidi omarssi gakkanaashin i tuna. Hegaappe guyyiyan, i geeshsha.

English Sentences: But if he wash them not, nor bathe his flesh; then he shall bear his iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba maayuwaa meeccana xayikko, ba bollaakka meecettana xayikko, ba nagaraa i bau tookkees yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asaa hagaadan yaaga; Taani, GODAI, intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: After the doings of the land of Egypt, wherein ye dwelt, shall ye not do: and after the doings of the land of Canaan, whither I bring you, shall ye not do: neither shall ye walk in their ordinances.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte kase de7ido Gibxxe biittaa asai oottiyoogaadan oottoppite; woikko ha77i taani inttena efiyo Kanaane biitta asai oottiyoogaadankka oottoppite; eta wogaakka kaalloppite.

English Sentences: Ye shall do my judgments, and keep mine ordinances, to walk therein: I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ta azazuwaa oottite; ta wogaakka naagite; qassi an biite. Taani, GODAI, intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Ye shall therefore keep my statutes, and my judgments: which if a man do, he shall live in them: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau ta azazuwaanne ta wogaa naagikko, intte paxa de7ana. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: None of you shall approach to any that is near of kin to him, to uncover their nakedness: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intteppe ooninne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau ba mata dabboora zin77oppo. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: The nakedness of thy father, or the nakedness of thy mother, shalt thou not uncover: she is thy mother; thou shalt not uncover her nakedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau ne aayeera zin77oppa; zin77ada ne aawaa kaushshoppa. A ne aayyiyo; iira zin77oppa.

English Sentences: The nakedness of thy father's wife shalt thou not uncover: it is thy father's nakedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau ne aawaa machcheera zin77oppa; zin77ada ne aawaa kaushshoppa.

English Sentences: The nakedness of thy sister, the daughter of thy father, or daughter of thy mother, whether she be born at home, or born abroad, even their nakedness thou shalt not uncover.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau ne michcheera zin77oppa; woi qassi son yelettida woi karen yelettida ne aawaa woi ne aayee na7eerakka zin77oppa.

English Sentences: The nakedness of thy son's daughter, or of thy daughter's daughter, even their nakedness thou shalt not uncover: for theirs is thine own nakedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau ne na7aa na7eera woikko ne na7ee na7eera zin77oppa. Zin77ikko ne huuphen nena kaushshaasa.

English Sentences: The nakedness of thy father's wife's daughter, begotten of thy father, she is thy sister, thou shalt not uncover her nakedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau ne aawaa keettaayee na7eera zin77oppa; a ne michchiyo gidiyo gishshau iira zin77oppa.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy father's sister: she is thy father's near kinswoman.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau ne aawaa michcheera zin77oppa. A ne aawau mata dabbo.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy mother's sister: for she is thy mother's near kinswoman.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ashuwaa amuwaa polanau ne aayee michcheera zin77oppa; a ne aayeessi mata dabbo.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy father's brother, thou shalt not approach to his wife: she is thine aunt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne aawaa ishaa kalluwaa qaarada ne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau a machcheera zin77oppa; a ne aawaa ishaa machchiyo.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy daughter in law: she is thy son's wife; thou shalt not uncover her nakedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau ne na7aa keettaayeera zin77oppa; a ne na7aa keettaayyiyo gidiyo gishshau, iira zin77oppa.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy brother's wife: it is thy brother's nakedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau ne ishaa keettaayeera zin77oppa; zin77ikko ne ishaa kaushshaasa.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of a woman and her daughter, neither shalt thou take her son's daughter, or her daughter's daughter, to uncover her nakedness; for they are her near kinswomen: it is wickedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau maccaaseeranne i na7eeranne naa77aara zin77oppa. I na7ee na7eera woi qassi i na7aa na7eerakka zin77oppa; eti iyyo mata dabbo gidiyo gishshau, hegee shaaramuxa.

English Sentences: Neither shalt thou take a wife to her sister, to vex her, to uncover her nakedness, beside the other in her life time.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne keettaayyiyaa paxa de7ishin, ne keettaayee michchiyo dawuttada ne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau iira zin77oppa.

English Sentences: Also thou shalt not approach unto a woman to uncover her nakedness, as long as she is put apart for her uncleanness.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne ashuwaa amuwaa polanau kushe qitai yin tuna uttida maccaaseera zin77oppa.

English Sentences: Moreover thou shalt not lie carnally with thy neighbour's wife, to defile thyself with her.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni tunennaadan ne shooruwaa keettaayeera zin77oppa.

English Sentences: And thou shalt not let any of thy seed pass through the fire to Molech, neither shalt thou profane the name of thy God: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne Xoossaa sunttaa tunissanau ne naatuppe issuwaanne taman xuuggidi, Molooka giyo eeqaassi yarshshanaadan immoppa. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not lie with mankind, as with womankind: it is abomination.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Maccaasaara zin77iyoogaadan attuma asaara zin77oppa; hegee sheneyiyaaba.

English Sentences: Neither shalt thou lie with any beast to defile thyself therewith: neither shall any woman stand before a beast to lie down thereto: it is confusion.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni tunennaadan ai meheeranne zin77oppa, qassi maccaasikka meheera zin77anau mehe sintti aadhdhoppo. Hegee wogi bainnaba.

English Sentences: Defile not ye yourselves in any of these things: for in all these the nations are defiled which I cast out before you:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intte sinttappe yedettiyo kawotettati ha oosotun tunido gishshau, intte hageeta milatiyaabatun tunoppite.

English Sentences: And the land is defiled: therefore I do visit the iniquity thereof upon it, and the land itself vomiteth out her inhabitants.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harai atto eta biittaikka tunido gishshau, a nagaraassi taani a qaxxayaas; qaxxayin biittaikka banan de7iyaageeta cuchchiis.

English Sentences: Ye shall therefore keep my statutes and my judgments, and shall not commit any of these abominations; neither any of your own nation, nor any stranger that sojourneth among you:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte ta higgiyaanne ta azazuwaa naagiteppe attin, Israa7eela asaa gidin woi intte giddon de7iya hara biitta asappe ooninne hagaa mala tuna oosuwaa oottoppite.

English Sentences: (For all these abominations have the men of the land done, which were before you, and the land is defiled;)
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intteppe kase ha biittan de7ida asati hagaa mala tunabaa oottido gishshau, biittai tuniis.

English Sentences: That the land spue not you out also, when ye defile it, as it spued out the nations that were before you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ha biittaa tunissikko, intteppe kase de7ida kawotettata ha biittai cuchchidoogaadan, inttenakka cuchchennaadan naagettite.

English Sentences: For whosoever shall commit any of these abominations, even the souls that commit them shall be cut off from among their people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeta milatiya tuna oosotuppe issuwaanne oottiya asi de7ikko, he asi ba asaa giddoppe bohetto.

English Sentences: Therefore shall ye keep mine ordinance, that ye commit not any one of these abominable customs, which were committed before you, and that ye defile not yourselves therein: I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau intteppe kase de7ida asati oottido tuna oosota ubbaa oottidi intte tunennaadan, intte ta azazuwaa naagite; taani, GODAI, intte Xoossaa yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Speak unto all the congregation of the children of Israel, and say unto them, Ye shall be holy: for I the LORD your God am holy.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asau ubbau hagaadan yaagada yoota; Taani, GODAI, intte Xoossai geeshsha gidiyo gishshau, inttekka geeshsha gidite.

English Sentences: Ye shall fear every man his mother, and his father, and keep my sabbaths: I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intteppe issoinne attennan ba aawaanne ba aayyiyo bonchcho; ta Sambbatatakka bonchchite. Taani, GODAI, intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Turn ye not unto idols, nor make to yourselves molten gods: I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tana aggidi eeqatuyyo goinnoppite; woi qassi birataappe seerissidi, xoossata intteyyo medhdhoppite. Taani, GODAI, intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: And if ye offer a sacrifice of peace offerings unto the LORD, ye shall offer it at your own will.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte issippetettaa yarshshuwaa GODAAYYO yarshshiyo wode, he yarshshoi intte gishshaa ekettanaadan, bessiyaagaadan yarshshite.

English Sentences: It shall be eaten the same day ye offer it, and on the morrow: and if ought remain until the third day, it shall be burnt in the fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: He yarshshoi intte yarshshido gallassan woikko wonttetta gallassan meetetto; heezzantto gallassai gakkanaashin attidaagee de7ikko hegee xuugetto.

English Sentences: And if it be eaten at all on the third day, it is abominable; it shall not be accepted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzantto gallassan a miikko, hegee sheneyiyaabaa; taani hegaa ekkikke.

English Sentences: Therefore every one that eateth it shall bear his iniquity, because he hath profaned the hallowed thing of the LORD: and that soul shall be cut off from among his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa miya ooninne ba nagaran i bau oishettana; aissi giikko, i GODAAYYO geeshsha gididabaa tunissiis. He asi ba asaa giddoppe bohetto.

English Sentences: And when ye reap the harvest of your land, thou shalt not wholly reap the corners of thy field, neither shalt thou gather the gleanings of thy harvest.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte biittan mokkida kattaa intte cakkiyo wode, gadiyaa gaxaa gakkanaashin cakkoppite; qassi cahaappe simmin de7iya poshiluwaakka poshiloppite.

English Sentences: And thou shalt not glean thy vineyard, neither shalt thou gather every grape of thy vineyard; thou shalt leave them for the poor and stranger: I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne woiniyaa aifiyaa mule maxada mittaa polloyoppa; sa7an wodhdhida woiniyaa aifiyaakka maxoppa; hegaa hiyyeesatussinne betetussi aggaaga. Taani, GODAI, intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Ye shall not steal, neither deal falsely, neither lie one to another.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte wuuqqoppite. "Worddotoppite. "Issoi issuwaa cimmoppite.

English Sentences: And ye shall not swear by my name falsely, neither shalt thou profane the name of thy God: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta sunttan wordduwan caaqqoppite; yaatidi intte Xoossaa sunttaa tunissoppite. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not defraud thy neighbour, neither rob him: the wages of him that is hired shall not abide with thee all night until the morning.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne shooruwaa sugoppa; woikko bonqqoppa. "Keraa oottiya bitaniyaa damoozaa diggada, issi qammaanne ne matan aissoppa.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not curse the deaf, nor put a stumblingblock before the blind, but shalt fear thy God: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tulliyaa qanggoppa; woi qassi qooqiyaa sinttan xubbiyaabaa wottoppa; shin neeni Xoossaassi yayya. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: Ye shall do no unrighteousness in judgment: thou shalt not respect the person of the poor, nor honor the person of the mighty: but in righteousness shalt thou judge thy neighbour.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Pirddaa pirddaidda geellayoppa; hiyyeesa a hiyyeesatettaa gishshau maaddada pirddoppa; duriyaakka a duretettaa gishshau yayyada aggoppa. SHin ne shooruwaayyo tumatettan pirdda.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not go up and down as a talebearer among thy people: neither shalt thou stand against the blood of thy neighbour: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne asaa giddon iita zigirssaa ekkada yuuyoppa. "Ne shooruwaa woriyoobaa aibanne oottoppa. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not hate thy brother in thine heart: thou shalt in any wise rebuke thy neighbour, and not suffer sin upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne ishaa ne wozanan ixxoppa. "Ne shooruwaa gaasuwan neeni nagara oottenna mala, a seera.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not avenge, nor bear any grudge against the children of thy people, but thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Haluwaa kiyoppa; qassi ne asaappe issuwaayyoonne uluwan lancce oiqqoppa. SHin ne shooruwaa ne huuphedan siiqa. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: Ye shall keep my statutes. Thou shalt not let thy cattle gender with a diverse kind: thou shalt not sow thy field with mingled seed: neither shall a garment mingled of linen and woollen come upon thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta azazota naaga. "Ne mehiyaappe issi qommo mehiyaa hara qommo dumma mehiyan birasissoppa. "Issi shooqan naa77u qommo zerettaa zeroppa. "Qassi naa77u qommobaappe dadettida maayo maayoppa.

English Sentences: And whosoever lieth carnally with a woman, that is a bondmaid, betrothed to an husband, and not at all redeemed, nor freedom given her; she shall be scourged; they shall not be put to death, because she was not free.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi asi hara asa gelanau giiga uttida danggiriixeera zin77ikko, qassi he danggiriixiyaakka ba danggiriixetettaappe wozettabeennaaro gidikko, eti qaxxayettanau bessees; shin a ba danggiriixetettaappe wozettabeenna gishshau, eta woranau koshshenna.

English Sentences: And he shall bring his trespass offering unto the LORD, unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, even a ram for a trespass offering.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne he bitanee ba naaquwaa yarshshuwaassi gidiya dorssaa Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaakko GODAA sintti eho.

English Sentences: And the priest shall make an atonement for him with the ram of the trespass offering before the LORD for his sin which he hath done: and the sin which he hath done shall be forgiven him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ehobare qeesee he naaquwaa yarshshuwaa dorssaa ekkidi, bitanee oottido nagaraa GODAA sinttan atto giissees; i oottido nagaraikka atto geetettana.

English Sentences: And when ye shall come into the land, and shall have planted all manner of trees for food, then ye shall count the fruit thereof as uncircumcised: three years shall it be as uncircumcised unto you: it shall not be eaten of.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte Kanaane biittaa geliyo wode, aifiyaa miyo ai qommo mitta tokkikkokka, he mittaa aifiyaa meetettennabaadan qoodite; heezzu laittai wuranaashin he mittaa aifee meetettenna; a mooppite.

English Sentences: But in the fourth year all the fruit thereof shall be holy to praise the LORD withal.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiddantta laittan he mittaa aifee ubbai GODAASSI galatau shiishshiyo geeshsha yarshsho gidana.

English Sentences: And in the fifth year shall ye eat of the fruit thereof, that it may yield unto you the increase thereof: I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he mittaa aifee intteyyo keehi darana mala, ichchashantta laittaa aifiyaa miite. Intte hagaadan oottikko, intte mittaa aifee darana. Taani GODAI intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Ye shall not eat any thing with the blood: neither shall ye use enchantment, nor observe times.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Suuttai a giddon de7iyo ai ashokka mooppite. "Kaayoppite woi shareechchoppite.

English Sentences: Ye shall not round the corners of your heads, neither shalt thou mar the corners of thy beard.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte huuphiyaa binnaanaa garssaara yuushshi aattidi qanxxoppite; qassi intte buuchchaakka yuushshi aattidi qanxxoppite.

English Sentences: Ye shall not make any cuttings in your flesh for the dead, nor print any marks upon you: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Haiqqida asa gishshau intte bollaa qanxxerettoppite; woikko cachchaa malaataa intte bollan kessoppite. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: Do not prostitute thy daughter, to cause her to be a whore; lest the land fall to whoredom, and the land become full of wickedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Biittai shaaramuxaa tunatettan kumidaagaa gidenna mala, ne na7iyo shaaramuxaa oosuwaassi aatta immada tunissoppa.

English Sentences: Ye shall keep my sabbaths, and reverence my sanctuary: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta Sambbatata bonchchite; taayyo goinniyo sohuwaakka bonchchite. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: Regard not them that have familiar spirits, neither seek after wizards, to be defiled by them: I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Moitiliyaa haasayissiyaageetukkonne shareechchotukko booppite; intte tunenna mala eta koyyoppite. Taani, GODAI, intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Thou shalt rise up before the hoary head, and honour the face of the old man, and fear thy God: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Puulummida asanne cimida asa be7iyo wode uttidosaappe dendda eqqa; eta bonchcha; ne Xoossaassi yayya. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: And if a stranger sojourn with thee in your land, ye shall not vex him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte biittan inttenaara de7iya betetu bollan sugettabaa oottoppite.

English Sentences: But the stranger that dwelleth with you shall be unto you as one born among you, and thou shalt love him as thyself; for ye were strangers in the land of Egypt: I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte biittan inttenaara de7iya bete asa intte biitta asadan xeellite; a intte huuphedan siiqite. Aissi giikko, inttekka kase Gibxxe biittan bete gididi de7ideta. Taani, GODAI, intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Ye shall do no unrighteousness in judgment, in meteyard, in weight, or in measure.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte pirddan likkiyooban, meezaanan wottidi kiliyoobaaninne makkiyooban worddotoppite.

English Sentences: Just balances, just weights, a just ephah, and a just hin, shall ye have: I am the LORD your God, which brought you out of the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte kiliyo meezaanai, intte makkiyoobainne likkiyo miishshati ubbai likke gidona. Taani inttena Gibxxe biittaappe kessada ehiida GODAA intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Therefore shall ye observe all my statutes, and all my judgments, and do them: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ta higgiyaanne ta azazuwaa ubbaa naagitenne oottite. Taani GODAA yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Again, thou shalt say to the children of Israel, Whosoever he be of the children of Israel, or of the strangers that sojourn in Israel, that giveth any of his seed unto Molech; he shall surely be put to death: the people of the land shall stone him with stones.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asau hagaadan yaagada yoota, Israa7eela asaappe gidin, woi betidi yiidi Israa7eela giddon de7iya hara biitta asaappe gidinkka, ooninne ba naatuppe issuwaa Molooka giyo eeqaayyo aattidi immikko, he asi haiqqo; he biittaa asai a shuchchan caddidi woro.

English Sentences: And I will set my face against that man, and will cut him off from among his people; because he hath given of his seed unto Molech, to defile my sanctuary, and to profane my holy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani he bitaniyaa morkkana; a asaa giddoppe shoddada a xaissana. Aissi giikko, i ba naatuppe issuwaa Molooka giyo eeqaayyo immiyoogan, ta Dunkkaaniyaa tunissiis; ta geeshsha sunttaakka kaushshiis.

English Sentences: And if the people of the land do any ways hide their eyes from the man, when he giveth of his seed unto Molech, and kill him not:
Wolaitta Sentences: He bitanee ba naatuppe issuwaa Molookassi immiyo wode, he biittaa asai be7iiddi, shenehoo giikko, qassi bitaniyaakka worennan aggikko,

English Sentences: Then I will set my face against that man, and against his family, and will cut him off, and all that go a whoring after him, to commit whoredom with Molech, from among their people.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani ta huuphen he bitaniyaanne asaa morkkana; anne Molookaara shaaramuxanau a kaalliya ubbata eta asaa giddoppe bohite.

English Sentences: And the soul that turneth after such as have familiar spirits, and after wizards, to go a whoring after them, I will even set my face against that soul, and will cut him off from among his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ai asinne tanan ammanettennan ixxidi, moitilliyaa haasayissiyaageetanne shareechchota oichchanau biikko, taani a morkkana; a asaa giddoppekka a xaissana.

English Sentences: Sanctify yourselves therefore, and be ye holy: for I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani, GODAI, intte Xoossaa gidiyo gishshau, simmi intte inttena dummayite; qassi geeshsha gidite.

English Sentences: And ye shall keep my statutes, and do them: I am the LORD which sanctify you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta higgiyaa naagitenne oottite. Taani inttena geeshshiya GODAATTENNEE.

English Sentences: For every one that curseth his father or his mother shall be surely put to death: he hath cursed his father or his mother; his blood shall be upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ai asinne ba aawaa woikko ba aayyiyo cayikko haiqqo. I ba aawaa woikko ba aayyiyo cayido gishshau, a suuttaa acoi a bollaana.

English Sentences: And the man that committeth adultery with another man's wife, even he that committeth adultery with his neighbour's wife, the adulterer and the adulteress shall surely be put to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi asi ba shooruwaa keettaayeera zin77ikko, he zin77ida bitaneenne mishiriyaa naa77aikka haiqqona.

English Sentences: And the man that lieth with his father's wife hath uncovered his father's nakedness: both of them shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba aawaa keettaayeera zin77ida asi ba aawaa kaushshiis; eti naa77aikka haiqqona. Eta suuttaa acoi eta bollaana.

English Sentences: And if a man lie with his daughter in law, both of them shall surely be put to death: they have wrought confusion; their blood shall be upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi asi ba na7aa keettaayeera zin77ikko, eti naa77aikka haiqqona. Eti tunabaa oottidosona. Eta suuttaa acoi eta bollaana.

English Sentences: If a man also lie with mankind, as he lieth with a woman, both of them have committed an abomination: they shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi attuma asi maccaasaara zin77iyoogaadan attuma asaara zin77ikko, eti naa77aikka tunabaa oottido gishshau haiqqona. Eta suuttaa acoi eta bollaana.

English Sentences: And if a man take a wife and her mother, it is wickedness: they shall be burnt with fire, both he and they; that there be no wickedness among you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi asi na7iyoonne aayyiyoonne issippe machchiyaabaa gidikko, hegee tunabaa; intte giddon tunatetti de7enna mala, inne etinne taman xuugettona.

English Sentences: And if a man lie with a beast, he shall surely be put to death: and ye shall slay the beast.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi asi meheera zin77ikko, i haiqqo; he macca mehiyookka worite.

English Sentences: And if a woman approach unto any beast, and lie down thereto, thou shalt kill the woman, and the beast: they shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi maccaasi meheera zin77ikko he maccaasiyoonne he mehiyaa naa77aakka worite; eti haiqqona. Eta suuttaa acoi eta bollaana.

English Sentences: And if a man shall take his sister, his father's daughter, or his mother's daughter, and see her nakedness, and she see his nakedness; it is a wicked thing; and they shall be cut off in the sight of their people: he hath uncovered his sister's nakedness; he shall bear his iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi asi ba michchiyo ba aawaa na7iyo woikko ba aayee na7iyo machchidi, iira zin77ikko, hegee pokkoba. Eti bantta asaa sinttan haiqqona. I ba michchiyo kaushshido gishshau, ba nagaran bau oishettana.

English Sentences: And if a man shall lie with a woman having her sickness, and shall uncover her nakedness; he hath discovered her fountain, and she hath uncovered the fountain of her blood: and both of them shall be cut off from among their people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi asi kushe qitai yiido maccaasee kalluwaa qaaridi iira zin77ikko, eti naa77aikka bantta asaa giddoppe bohettona. Aissi giikko i i suuttai goggiyo pulttuwaa kalloyiis; akka ba suuttai goggiyo pulttuwaa kalloyaasu.

English Sentences: And thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy mother's sister, nor of thy father's sister: for he uncovereth his near kin: they shall bear their iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne aayee michcheera woikko ne aawaa michcheera zin77oppa; aissi giikko, hegaa oottiyoogee ba mata dabbuwaa kaushshiyoogaa. Intte naa77aikka intte nagaran oishettana.

English Sentences: And if a man shall lie with his uncle's wife, he hath uncovered his uncle's nakedness: they shall bear their sin; they shall die childless.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi asi ba aawaa ishaa keettaayeera zin77ikko, i ba aawaa ishaa kaushshiis. Eti bantta nagaran banttau oishettana; eti naa77aikka na7a yelennan haiqqana.

English Sentences: And if a man shall take his brother's wife, it is an unclean thing: he hath uncovered his brother's nakedness; they shall be childless.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi asi ba ishaa keettaayyiyo machchikko, hegee tunatetta. I ba ishaa kaushshiis; eti naa77aikka na7a yelokkona.

English Sentences: Ye shall therefore keep all my statutes, and all my judgments, and do them: that the land, whither I bring you to dwell therein, spue you not out.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi intte de7anaadan, taani inttena gelissiyo biittai inttena cuchchenna mala, intte ta higgiyaanne ta azazuwaa naagitenne oottite.

English Sentences: And ye shall not walk in the manners of the nation, which I cast out before you: for they committed all these things, and therefore I abhorred them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intte sinttappe xaissiyo asatu de7uwaa wogaa kaalloppite. Eti hagaa ubbaa oottido gishshau, taani eta shenetaas.

English Sentences: But I have said unto you, Ye shall inherit their land, and I will give it unto you to possess it, a land that floweth with milk and honey: I am the LORD your God, which have separated you from other people.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani inttena, "Eta biittaa intte laattana; intte he biittaa inttebaa oottanaadan, he maattainne eessai goggiyo biittaa taani intteyyo immana" yaagaas. Taani inttena hara asatuppe dummaya kessida GODAA intte Xoossaattenne.

English Sentences: Ye shall therefore put difference between clean beasts and unclean, and between unclean fowls and clean: and ye shall not make your souls abominable by beast, or by fowl, or by any manner of living thing that creepeth on the ground, which I have separated from you as unclean.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau intte geeshsha gidida mehetanne kafota geeshsha gidennaageetuppe shaakkidi erite. Taani hageeti intteyyo tuna ga wottido mehetun, kafotuuninne biittan qaaxerettiyaabatun ubban intte huuphiyaa tunissoppite.

English Sentences: And ye shall be holy unto me: for I the LORD am holy, and have severed you from other people, that ye should be mine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAI geeshsha gidiyo gishshaunne intte tabaa gidana mala inttena hara asaappe dummayido gishshau, inttekka taayyo geeshsha gidite.

English Sentences: A man also or woman that hath a familiar spirit, or that is a wizard, shall surely be put to death: they shall stone them with stones: their blood shall be upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi attuma asi woikko macca asi moitilliyaara haasayiyaagaa woikko shareechcho gidikko, eti haiqqanau bessees. Eti shuchchan cadettona. Eta suuttaa acoi eta bollaana yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto Moses, Speak unto the priests the sons of Aaron, and say unto them, There shall none be defiled for the dead among his people:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis, "Qeese gidiya Aaroona attuma naatussi hagaadan yaagada oda; Intteppe ooninne

English Sentences: But for his kin, that is near unto him, that is, for his mother, and for his father, and for his son, and for his daughter, and for his brother,
Wolaitta Sentences: ba mata dabbo, ba aayee, ba aawaa, ba attuma na7aa, ba macca na7ee, ba ishaa,

English Sentences: And for his sister a virgin, that is nigh unto him, which hath had no husband; for her may he be defiled.
Wolaitta Sentences: woikko azina gelennan, a son de7iya ba michchee ahaa gidana xayikko, haiqqida asa ahaa oogaanne bochchidi, bana tunissoppo.

English Sentences: But he shall not defile himself, being a chief man among his people, to profane himself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi ekuwaaninne geluwan dabbotida asa ahaa bochchidikka bana tunissoppo.

English Sentences: They shall not make baldness upon their head, neither shall they shave off the corner of their beard, nor make any cuttings in their flesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qeeseti haiqqidabau kayyottanau bantta huuphiyaa meedettoppona; bantta buuchchaakka qanttan qanxxoppona; woi qassi bantta bollaakka qanxxerettoppona.

English Sentences: They shall be holy unto their God, and not profane the name of their God: for the offerings of the LORD made by fire, and the bread of their God, they do offer: therefore they shall be holy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta Xoossaayyo geeshsha gidona; qassi bantta Xoossaa sunttaakka tunissoppona. Aissi giikko eti GODAAYYO taman xuuggidi yarshshiyo, qumaa yarshshuwaa shiishshiyaageeta; hegaa gishshau, eti geeshsha gidanau bessees.

English Sentences: They shall not take a wife that is a whore, or profane; neither shall they take a woman put away from her husband: for he is holy unto his God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassikka qeeseti shaaramuxa maccaasa, geela7otettai ekettiichchido maccaasa, woikko azinai yeddido maccaasa ekkoppona. Aissi giikko, qeeseti bantta Xoossaayyo geeshsha.

English Sentences: Thou shalt sanctify him therefore; for he offereth the bread of thy God: he shall be holy unto thee: for I the LORD, which sanctify you, am holy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesee intte Xoossaassi qumaa yarshshuwaa shiishshiyaagaa gidiyo gishshau, i hara asaappe dummato. Taani inttena geeshshiya intte GODAI geeshsha gidiyo gishshau, ikka geeshsha gido.

English Sentences: And the daughter of any priest, if she profane herself by playing the whore, she profaneth her father: she shall be burnt with fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ai qeesiyaa na7iyo gidikkokka shaaramuxada bana tunissikko, hinna ba aawaa kaushshaasu. A taman xuugettada haiqqu.

English Sentences: And he that is the high priest among his brethren, upon whose head the anointing oil was poured, and that is consecrated to put on the garments, shall not uncover his head, nor rend his clothes;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qeese ubbatu halaqai, a huuphiyan tiyettiyo zaitee gukkido gishshaunne i qeesetettaa maayuwaa maayanau dummatida asa gidiyo gishshau, ba huuphiyaa binnaanaa kallo wottoppo; woikko ba maayuwaakka pooshshoppo.

English Sentences: Neither shall he go in to any dead body, nor defile himself for his father, or for his mother;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ai ahaa gidikkokka, de7iyoosaa i geloppo; harai atto ba aawaa woikko ba aayee ahaa gidikkokka, bana hegan tunissoppo.

English Sentences: Neither shall he go out of the sanctuary, nor profane the sanctuary of his God; for the crown of the anointing oil of his God is upon him: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: A geeshshanau tiyiyo Xoossaa zaitee a bollan de7iyo gishshau, qeesee Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaappe kiyoppo; Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaakka tunissoppo. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: And he shall take a wife in her virginity.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qeesee geela7o macca na7a ekko.

English Sentences: A widow, or a divorced woman, or profane, or an harlot, these shall he not take: but he shall take a virgin of his own people to wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Azinai haiqqido maccaasiyo, woi azinai yeddido maccaasiyo, woi shaaramuxa maccaasiyo machchoppo. SHin ba asaa giddoppe geela7o macca na7a dooridi machcho.

English Sentences: Neither shall he profane his seed among his people: for I the LORD do sanctify him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaanana xayikko, i ba asaa giddon ba zeretta gidiya ba naata tunissana. Taani a geeshshiyaagee, GODAATTENNEE yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa, hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Speak unto Aaron, saying, Whosoever he be of thy seed in their generations that hath any blemish, let him not approach to offer the bread of his God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni Aaroonassi hagaadan yaagada oda; Sinttaara yiya ne zerettaappe bollai tilla gidenna asi ooninne qumaa yarshshuwaa taayyo immanau shiiqoppo.

English Sentences: For whatsoever man he be that hath a blemish, he shall not approach: a blind man, or a lame, or he that hath a flat nose, or any thing superfluous,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko bollai tilla gidenna asi ooninne shiiqanau bessenna. Qooqe, woikko wobbe, woi som77oi narphphettido, woi palaha bollai de7iyo asi,

English Sentences: Or a man that is brokenfooted, or brokenhanded,
Wolaitta Sentences: woi toho woi kushe silai,

English Sentences: Or crookbackt, or a dwarf, or that hath a blemish in his eye, or be scurvy, or scabbed, or hath his stones broken;
Wolaitta Sentences: woi quunai, woi dinkkee, woi aifee sakkiyo asi, woi puusoi oiqqido asi, woi ilahai oiqqido asi, woi mureessa gidinkka bollai tilla gidenna asi, ooninne shiiqoppo.

English Sentences: No man that hath a blemish of the seed of Aaron the priest shall come nigh to offer the offerings of the LORD made by fire: he hath a blemish; he shall not come nigh to offer the bread of his God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesiyaa Aaroona zariyaappe bollai tilla gidenna asi ooninne GODAAYYO taman xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa shiishshanau shiiqoppo. Ayyo bollai tilla gidennaagaa gidaappe hini baggan, ba Xoossaassi qumaa yarshshuwaa shiishshanau i bessenna.

English Sentences: He shall eat the bread of his God, both of the most holy, and of the holy.
Wolaitta Sentences: I geeshsha qumaanne qassi ubbappe aadhdhiya geeshsha gidiya ba Xoossaa qumaakka maanau danddayees.

English Sentences: Only he shall not go in unto the vail, nor come nigh unto the altar, because he hath a blemish; that he profane not my sanctuaries: for I the LORD do sanctify them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ayyo bollai tilla gidenna gishshau, i ta Dunkkaaniyaa tunissennaadan, magalashuwaakko woi yarshshiyoosaakko shiiqoppo. Aissi giikko, eta geeshshiyaagee taani GODAATTENNEE yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Moses told it unto Aaron, and to his sons, and unto all the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Muusee Aaroonassi, a attuma naatussinne Israa7eela asaassi ubbaassi hagaa yootiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Speak unto Aaron and to his sons, that they separate themselves from the holy things of the children of Israel, and that they profane not my holy name in those things which they hallow unto me: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta geeshsha sunttaa eti tunissenna mala, Israa7eela asai taayyo dummayido imota Aarooninne a attuma naati bonchchuwan ekkidi, geeshshatettan naagana mala, etau yoota. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: Say unto them, Whosoever he be of all your seed among your generations, that goeth unto the holy things, which the children of Israel hallow unto the LORD, having his uncleanness upon him, that soul shall be cut off from my presence: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Etau hagaadan yaaga; Sinttaara yiya yeleta ubban intte zariyaappe ooninne tuni uttidi, Israa7eela asai GODAAYYO dummayido geeshsha yarshshuwaakko shiiqikko, he asi ta sinttaappe xayo. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: What man soever of the seed of Aaron is a leper, or hath a running issue; he shall not eat of the holy things, until he be clean. And whoso toucheth any thing that is unclean by the dead, or a man whose seed goeth from him;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aaroona zariyaappe hanttaara goga harggee de7iyo, woikko bollaappe aibakko goggiyo ooninne geeyana gakkanaashin, geeshsha yarshshuwaappe mooppo. Ahaa bochchidi tunidabaa woikko a attumatettaappe zeretti gukkido ura bochchiya ooninne tuna.

English Sentences: Or whosoever toucheth any creeping thing, whereby he may be made unclean, or a man of whom he may take uncleanness, whatsoever uncleanness he hath;
Wolaitta Sentences: Woi qassi sa7aara gooshettiya, tunissiyaabata, woi ai mala tunatetta gidikkonne tunissiya asa bochchiya uri,

English Sentences: The soul which hath touched any such shall be unclean until even, and shall not eat of the holy things, unless he wash his flesh with water.
Wolaitta Sentences: woi hegaa malabaa aibanne bochchiya asi, omarssi gakkanaashin i tuna; ba bollaa haattan meecettennan de7iiddi, he geeshsha yarshshuwaappe i maanau koshshenna.

English Sentences: And when the sun is down, he shall be clean, and shall afterward eat of the holy things; because it is his food.
Wolaitta Sentences: Awai wulliyo wode i geeshsha gidees; Hegaappe guyyiyan, he geeshsha yarshshuwaappe bana gakkiyaagaa mo.

English Sentences: That which dieth of itself, or is torn with beasts, he shall not eat to defile himself therewith: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bau haiqqidabaa woikko do7i worido mehe asho mooppo; hegee tunissiyaabaa. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: They shall therefore keep mine ordinance, lest they bear sin for it, and die therefore, if they profane it: I the LORD do sanctify them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qeeseti ta wogaa naagona; naagennan ixxikko, eti a tunissidi a nagaran haiqqana. Eta geeshshiyaagee taani GODAA.

English Sentences: There shall no stranger eat of the holy thing: a sojourner of the priest, or an hired servant, shall not eat of the holy thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He geeshsha yarshshuwaa qeesiyaa so asaappe attin, hara asi mooppo; qeesiyaa so yiida imattaa gidin, woi qaxarettidi oottiya ashkkara gidinkka mooppo.

English Sentences: But if the priest buy any soul with his money, he shall eat of it, and he that is born in his house: they shall eat of his meat.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin qeesee ba biran shammido aillee woikko a son yelettida aillee he qumaappe mo.

English Sentences: If the priest's daughter also be married unto a stranger, she may not eat of an offering of the holy things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese gidenna hara asa gelida qeesiyaa na7iyaa he geeshsha yarshshuwaappe muuppu.

English Sentences: But if the priest's daughter be a widow, or divorced, and have no child, and is returned unto her father's house, as in her youth, she shall eat of her father's meat: but there shall no stranger eat thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin qeesiyaa na7iyaa azini haiqqin, woikko azini yeddin, na7a yelennan kase ba geela7otettan de7iyoogaadan simmada ba aawaa soo yiikko, a ba aawaa gakkiya qumaappe mu. SHin hara asi ooninne hegaappe mooppo.

English Sentences: And if a man eat of the holy thing unwittingly, then he shall put the fifth part thereof unto it, and shall give it unto the priest with the holy thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi asi erennan de7iiddi geeshsha yarshshuwaappe miikko, he i miido qumaa waagaa bolli xeetaappe laatamu kushiyaa gujjidi qeesiyaassi immo.

English Sentences: And they shall not profane the holy things of the children of Israel, which they offer unto the LORD;
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai GODAASSI yarshshiyo geeshsha yarshshuwaa qeeseti tunissoppona.

English Sentences: Or suffer them to bear the iniquity of trespass, when they eat their holy things: for I the LORD do sanctify them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta ehiido geeshsha yarshshuwaa banttau miidi, bantta nagaran oishettanaadan, qeeseti oottanau koshshenna. Aissi giikko, eta geeshshiyaagee, taani GODAA! yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis,

English Sentences: Speak unto Aaron, and to his sons, and unto all the children of Israel, and say unto them, Whatsoever he be of the house of Israel, or of the strangers in Israel, that will offer his oblation for all his vows, and for all his freewill offerings, which they will offer unto the LORD for a burnt offering;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aaroonassi, a naatussinne Israa7eela asa ubbaassi hagaadan yaagada yoota; Israa7eela asaappe gidin woikko eta giddon de7iya betiyaappe ooninne GODAAYYO xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa ba dosan coo immiyo woi ba shiiquwaa gattanau yarshshiyo wode,

English Sentences: Ye shall offer at your own will a male without blemish, of the beeves, of the sheep, or of the goats.
Wolaitta Sentences: he yarshshoi ekettana mala, mirgguwaappe woi dorssaappe woikko deeshshappe tilla bollaara de7iya attumaagaa gido.

English Sentences: But whatsoever hath a blemish, that shall ye not offer: for it shall not be acceptable for you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bollai tilla gidennaagee aiba gidikkonne ekettenna gishshau, hegaa shiishshoppa.

English Sentences: And whosoever offereth a sacrifice of peace offerings unto the LORD to accomplish his vow, or a freewill offering in beeves or sheep, it shall be perfect to be accepted; there shall be no blemish therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi oona gidikkonne ba shiiquwaa gattanau issippetettaa yarshshuwaa GODAASSI yarshshiyo wode, woi qassi ba mehiyaappe ba dosan coo immiyo imotaa GODAASSI shiishshiyo wode, hegee ekettana mala i tilla bollaara de7iyaagaa gido.

English Sentences: Blind, or broken, or maimed, or having a wen, or scurvy, or scabbed, ye shall not offer these unto the LORD, nor make an offering by fire of them upon the altar unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte mehiyaappe qooqiyaa, woi mequwaa, woikko gunddaa, woikko giiyiya masunttai, woikko puusoi, woikko ilahai de7iyoogaa GODAASSI yarshshoppite; qassi taman xuuggiyo yarshsho oottidikka yarshshiyoosaa bollan GODAAYYO shiishshoppite.

English Sentences: Either a bullock or a lamb that hath any thing superfluous or lacking in his parts, that mayest thou offer for a freewill offering; but for a vow it shall not be accepted.
Wolaitta Sentences: A bollan palaha meretai woi pacabai de7iyo korimaa woi dorssaa issi asi ba dosan coo immiyo yarshshuwaassi shiishshanau danddayees; shin shiiqo gato gidikko, hegee ekettenna.

English Sentences: Ye shall not offer unto the LORD that which is bruised, or crushed, or broken, or cut; neither shall ye make any offering thereof in your land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sanggisettidaagaa woikko qoxettidaagaa woikko kaattai masunxxidoogaa woikko qanxxettidaagaa GODAAYYO yarshshoppite. Intte biittan hegaa malabaa oottoppite.

English Sentences: Neither from a stranger's hand shall ye offer the bread of your God of any of these; because their corruption is in them, and blemishes be in them: they shall not be accepted for you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte giddon de7iya allaga asatuppe ekkido hegaa mala mehiyaakka intte Xoossaassi quma oottidi shiishshoppite. Eta bollai tilla gidennaagaa gaasuwan etan wotoi de7iyo gishshau, eti intte gishshaa ekettokkona yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis,

English Sentences: When a bullock, or a sheep, or a goat, is brought forth, then it shall be seven days under the dam; and from the eighth day and thenceforth it shall be accepted for an offering made by fire unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Miizza mari woi dorssa mari woikko deeshsha mari yelettiyo wode, laappun gallassaa ba aayeera takko. Hosppuntta gallassaappe doommidi, GODAAYYO taman xuuggidi shiishshiyo yarshsho oottidi shiishshanau danddayettees.

English Sentences: And whether it be cow or ewe, ye shall not kill it and her young both in one day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Miizziyo, dorssiyo, woi deeshshiyo i maraara issi gallassi shukkoppite.

English Sentences: And when ye will offer a sacrifice of thanksgiving unto the LORD, offer it at your own will.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte galataa yarshshuwaa GODAAYYO shiishshiyo wode, intte yarshshoi ekettanaadan yarshshite.

English Sentences: On the same day it shall be eaten up; ye shall leave none of it until the morrow: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: He yarshshoi he gallassikka meetetti agganau koshshees; appe aibanne wonttossi ashshoppite. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: Therefore shall ye keep my commandments, and do them: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta azazuwaa naagitenne oottite. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: Neither shall ye profane my holy name; but I will be hallowed among the children of Israel: I am the LORD which hallow you,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi ta geeshsha sunttaa intte tunissoppite; Israa7eela asaa giddon taani geeshsha gidiyoogee erettanau bessees. Inttena geeshshiyaagee, taani GODAA.

English Sentences: That brought you out of the land of Egypt, to be your God: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteyyo Xoossaa gidanau, inttena Gibxxe biittaappe kessidaagee tana. Taani GODAA" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, Concerning the feasts of the LORD, which ye shall proclaim to be holy convocations, even these are my feasts.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asaayyo hagaadan yaagada yoota; Geeshsha yaa7a gi awaajjidi, intte bonchchanau bessiya keerettida GODAA baalati hageeta.

English Sentences: Six days shall work be done: but the seventh day is the sabbath of rest, an holy convocation; ye shall do no work therein: it is the sabbath of the LORD in all your dwellings.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte usuppun gallassaa oosuwaa ootteeta; shin laappuntta gallassi intte shemppiyo Sambbata gallassa; he gallassan geeshsha yaa7aa shiiqite; aiba oosonne oottoppite; intte de7iyo sohuwan ubban hegee GODAASSI Sambbata.

English Sentences: These are the feasts of the LORD, even holy convocations, which ye shall proclaim in their seasons.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eta wodiyan wodiyan geeshsha yaa7a ootti awaajjidi intte bonchchanau bessiya GODAA baalati hageeta.

English Sentences: In the fourteenth day of the first month at even is the LORD's passover.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro aginan tammanne oiddantto gallassi sa7ai omariyo wode, GODAA Paasikai doommees.

English Sentences: And on the fifteenth day of the same month is the feast of unleavened bread unto the LORD: seven days ye must eat unleavened bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi he aginankka tammanne ichchashantto gallassai GODAA Oittaa Baalaa gallassa; hegaa gishshau laappun gallassatun irshshoi gelibeenna oittaa miite.

English Sentences: In the first day ye shall have an holy convocation: ye shall do no servile work therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassatuppe koiro gallassan geeshsha yaa7aa shiiqite; daafurssiya ooso aibanne oottoppite.

English Sentences: But ye shall offer an offering made by fire unto the LORD seven days: in the seventh day is an holy convocation: ye shall do no servile work therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laappun gallassa ubbaa GODAAYYO taman xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa shiishshite; laappuntta gallassan qassi geeshsha yaa7aa shiiqite; daafurssiya ooso aibanne oottoppite yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, When ye be come into the land which I give unto you, and shall reap the harvest thereof, then ye shall bring a sheaf of the firstfruits of your harvest unto the priest:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asaayyo hagaadan yaagada yoota; Taani intteyyo immiyo biittaa gelidi, intte kattaa cakkiyo wode, he kattau koiro aifiyaa mirqqiyaa qeesiyaakko ekki yiite.

English Sentences: And he shall wave the sheaf before the LORD, to be accepted for you: on the morrow after the sabbath the priest shall wave it.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI inttebaa ekkana mala, Sambbata wonttetta gallassi qeesee he mirqqiyaa GODAA sinttan pudenne duge wuxaawuxo.

English Sentences: And ye shall offer that day when ye wave the sheaf an he lamb without blemish of the first year for a burnt offering unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: He intte mirqqiyaa wuxaawuxido gallassi tilla bollaara de7iya issi laitta dorssa orggiyaa xuuggiyo yarshsho oottidi GODAAYYO shiishshite.

English Sentences: And the meat offering thereof shall be two tenth deals of fine flour mingled with oil, an offering made by fire unto the LORD for a sweet savour: and the drink offering thereof shall be of wine, the fourth part of an hin.
Wolaitta Sentences: He yarshshuwaara issippe wogaraa zaitiyan munaqettida naa77u kilo giraame lo77o xiilliyaa kattaa yarshsho oottidi shiishshite; hegee GODAAYYO taman xuuggiyo, sawuwaa tonggu giya yarshsho gidana; hegaarakka qassi issippe issi litiro gidiya woiniyaa eessaa shiishshite.

English Sentences: And ye shall eat neither bread, nor parched corn, nor green ears, until the selfsame day that ye have brought an offering unto your God: it shall be a statute for ever throughout your generations in all your dwellings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha yarshshuwaa intte intte Xoossaassi shiishshiyo gallassai gakkanaashin, ooratta gakkida kattaappe oittaa, woi xiixaa gidin, qayyiyaa gidinkka mooppite. Hagee intte de7iyoosan ubban sinttaara yiya yeletau ubbau merinau woga.

English Sentences: And ye shall count unto you from the morrow after the sabbath, from the day that ye brought the sheaf of the wave offering; seven sabbaths shall be complete:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte wuxaawuxiyo yarshshuwaa mirqqiyaa ehiido Sambbata wonttettappe doommidi, laappun saamintta kumettaa qoodite.

English Sentences: Even unto the morrow after the seventh sabbath shall ye number fifty days; and ye shall offer a new meat offering unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laappuntta Sambbataa wonttetta gallassai gakkanaashin, ishatamu gallassaa qoodidi, ooratta gakkida kattaa yarshshuwaa GODAASSI shiishshite.

English Sentences: Ye shall bring out of your habitations two wave loaves of two tenth deals: they shall be of fine flour; they shall be baken with leaven; they are the firstfruits unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte aqiyo sohuwaappe naa77u kilo giraame gidiya lo77o xiilliyaappe irshshuwaa yeggidi uukkido naa77u oittaa wuxaawuxanau ekki yiite. Hegee koiro gakkida kattaa aifiyaappe GODAASSI yarshsho gidees.

English Sentences: And ye shall offer with the bread seven lambs without blemish of the first year, and one young bullock, and two rams: they shall be for a burnt offering unto the LORD, with their meat offering, and their drink offerings, even an offering made by fire, of sweet savour unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: He oittaara issippe tilla bollaara de7iya issi laitta gidido laappun dorssa marata, issi mirgguwaanne naa77u dorssa orggeta shiishshite. Kattaa yarshshuwaaranne ushshaa yarshshuwaara issippe GODAAYYO taman xuuggiyo, sawuwaa tonggu giya yarshsho oottidi yarshshite.

English Sentences: Then ye shall sacrifice one kid of the goats for a sin offering, and two lambs of the first year for a sacrifice of peace offerings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi issi deeshsha orggiyaa nagaraa yarshshuwaassi, issi laitta gidido naa77u dorssa orggetakka issippetettaa yarshshuwaassi shiishshite.

English Sentences: And the priest shall wave them with the bread of the firstfruits for a wave offering before the LORD, with the two lambs: they shall be holy to the LORD for the priest.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qeesee he koiro gakkida kattaa aifiyaa oittaanne he naa77u dorssata wuxaawuxiyo yarshsho oottidi, GODAA sinttan wuxaawuxees; hegeeti GODAASSI geeshsha; qassi qeesiyaassikka qommo.

English Sentences: And ye shall proclaim on the selfsame day, that it may be an holy convocation unto you: ye shall do no servile work therein: it shall be a statute for ever in all your dwellings throughout your generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassikka awaajjidi geeshsha yaa7aa shiiqite; daafurssiya ooso aibanne oottoppite. Hagee intte de7iyoosan ubban sinttaara yiya yeletau ubbau merinau woga.

English Sentences: And when ye reap the harvest of your land, thou shalt not make clean riddance of the corners of thy field when thou reapest, neither shalt thou gather any gleaning of thy harvest: thou shalt leave them unto the poor, and to the stranger: I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte biittan mokkida kattaa intte cakkiyo wode, intte shooqaa gaxaa gakkanau cakkoppite; cakkishin attiya poshiluwaakka qoroppite; hegaa hiyyeesatuyyoonne betetuyyo aggiyaaggite. Taani, GODAI, intte Xoossaa yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis,

English Sentences: Speak unto the children of Israel, saying, In the seventh month, in the first day of the month, shall ye have a sabbath, a memorial of blowing of trumpets, an holy convocation.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asaayyo hagaadan yaagada yoota; Laappuntta aginan koiro gallassaa shemppo gallassaa oottidi bonchchite; hassayissuwaa malkkataikka punettiyo wode, geeshsha yaa7aa shiiqite.

English Sentences: Ye shall do no servile work therein: but ye shall offer an offering made by fire unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassan GODAAYYO taman xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa shiishshiteppe attin, daafurssiya ooso aibanne oottoppite yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis,

English Sentences: Also on the tenth day of this seventh month there shall be a day of atonement: it shall be an holy convocation unto you; and ye shall afflict your souls, and offer an offering made by fire unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha laappuntta aginaayyo tammantta gallassai nagaraa atto giissiyo gallassa; he gallassi geeshsha yaa7aa shiiqite; qassi intte huuphiyaa kaushshite; yaatidi GODAAYYO taman xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa shiishshite.

English Sentences: And ye shall do no work in that same day: for it is a day of atonement, to make an atonement for you before the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassai GODAA intte Xoossaa sinttan intte nagarai atto geetettana mala, intte nagaraa atto giissiyo gallassa gidiyo gishshau, he gallassi aiba oosonne oottoppite.

English Sentences: For whatsoever soul it be that shall not be afflicted in that same day, he shall be cut off from among his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi banatettaa kaushshenna asi ooninne ba asaa giddoppe bohetto.

English Sentences: And whatsoever soul it be that doeth any work in that same day, the same soul will I destroy from among his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi aiba ooso gidikkonne oottiya asa taani a asaa giddoppe xaissana.

English Sentences: Ye shall do no manner of work: it shall be a statute for ever throughout your generations in all your dwellings.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi aiba oosonne oottoppite. Hagee intte de7iyoosan ubban sinttaara yiya yeletau ubbau merinau woga.

English Sentences: It shall be unto you a sabbath of rest, and ye shall afflict your souls: in the ninth day of the month at even, from even unto even, shall ye celebrate your sabbath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee intte waanna shemppuwaa shemppiyo Sambbata gallassa. He gallassan intte huuphiyaa kaushshite. He aginan uddufuntta gallassan omarssaappe doommidi, tammantta gallassaa omarssai gakkanaashin, intte Sambbataa bonchchite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis,

English Sentences: Speak unto the children of Israel, saying, The fifteenth day of this seventh month shall be the feast of tabernacles for seven days unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asaayyo hagaadan yaagada yoota; Ha laappuntta aginan tammanne ichchashantta gallassaappe doommidi, laappun gallassai GODAAYYO Daase Baala.

English Sentences: On the first day shall be an holy convocation: ye shall do no servile work therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassatuppe koiro gallassan geeshsha yaa7aa shiiqite; daafurssiya ooso aibanne oottoppite.

English Sentences: Seven days ye shall offer an offering made by fire unto the LORD: on the eighth day shall be an holy convocation unto you; and ye shall offer an offering made by fire unto the LORD: it is a solemn assembly; and ye shall do no servile work therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laappun gallassan ubban GODAAYYO taman xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa shiishshite; hosppuntta gallassan qassi geeshsha yaa7aa shiiqite; GODAAYYO taman yarshshiyo yarshshuwaakka shiishshite. He gallassai intte shiiquwaa poliyo gallassa gidiyo gishshau, daafurssiya ooso aibanne oottoppite.

English Sentences: These are the feasts of the LORD, which ye shall proclaim to be holy convocations, to offer an offering made by fire unto the LORD, a burnt offering, and a meat offering, a sacrifice, and drink offerings, every thing upon his day:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taman xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne kattaa yarshshuwaa, qassi hara yarshshota ubbaanne ushshaa yarshshuwaa, koshshiyaagaa keenaa keerido gallassan GODAASSI shiishshanau, intte geeshsha yaa7a oottidi awaajjana GODAA baalati hageeta.

English Sentences: Beside the sabbaths of the LORD, and beside your gifts, and beside all your vows, and beside all your freewill offerings, which ye give unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha baalati GODAA Sambbatatuppe, intte imota oottidi GODAAYYO immiyoobatuppe, shiiquwaa gattiyoobatuppenne intte intte dosan coo immiyoobatuppe dumma.

English Sentences: Also in the fifteenth day of the seventh month, when ye have gathered in the fruit of the land, ye shall keep a feast unto the LORD seven days: on the first day shall be a sabbath, and on the eighth day shall be a sabbath.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laappuntta aginan tammanne ichchashantta gallassan intte biittan mokkidabaa cakkidi shiishshidoogaappe guyyiyan, GODAA baalaa laappun gallassaa bonchchite; koiro gallassainne hosppuntta gallassai intteyyo waanna shemppo gallassa.

English Sentences: And ye shall take you on the first day the boughs of goodly trees, branches of palm trees, and the boughs of thick trees, and willows of the brook; and ye shall rejoice before the LORD your God seven days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro gallassan lo77o mittaa aifiyaappe, zambbaa tashiyaappe, irxxa haittaara de7iya mittaa tashiyaappenne shaafa lanqqen dicciya lee7e mittaappe ekkidi, GODAA intte Xoossaa sinttan ufaittiiddi, laappun gallassaa baalaa bonchchite.

English Sentences: And ye shall keep it a feast unto the LORD seven days in the year. It shall be a statute for ever in your generations: ye shall celebrate it in the seventh month.
Wolaitta Sentences: He baalaa laittan laittan laappun gallassaa GODAASSI bonchchite. Hegee sinttaara yiya yeletau ubbau merinau woga. Intte hegaa laappuntta aginan bonchchite.

English Sentences: Ye shall dwell in booths seven days; all that are Israelites born shall dwell in booths:
Wolaitta Sentences: He laappun gallassaa intte daasiyan de7ite; Israa7eela biitta asa gidiya ubbai daasiyan de7ite.

English Sentences: That your generations may know that I made the children of Israel to dwell in booths, when I brought them out of the land of Egypt: I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee sinttaara yiya yeletai ubbai Israa7eela asaa taani Gibxxeppe kessido wode, eti daasiyan de7anaadan oottidoogaa eranaassa. Taani GODAA intte Xoossaa yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Moses declared unto the children of Israel the feasts of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan oottidi, Muusee GODAA Baalata bonchchiyo wogaa Israa7eela asaayyo yootiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis,

English Sentences: Command the children of Israel, that they bring unto thee pure oil olive beaten for the light, to cause the lamps to burn continually.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xomppee to7ennan eexxiiddi de7ana mala, assi koshshiya zaitiyaa wogaraa teeraa caddidi gum77in kiyiya geeshshaa neeyyo ehaana mala, Israa7eelata azaza.

English Sentences: Without the vail of the testimony, in the tabernacle of the congregation, shall Aaron order it from the evening unto the morning before the LORD continually: it shall be a statute for ever in your generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa giddon de7iya markkatettaa magalashuwaappe kare baggaara, omarssappe maallado gakkanaashin, Aarooni GODAA sinttan he xomppiyaa ubba wode eetto. Sinttaara yiya yeletau ubbau hegee merinau woga.

English Sentences: He shall order the lamps upon the pure candlestick before the LORD continually.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xomppiyaa wottiyo, walahi bainna worqqa ballaa bolli de7iya xomppeti GODAA sinttan ubba wode eexxanaadan Aarooni naago.

English Sentences: And thou shalt take fine flour, and bake twelve cakes thereof: two tenth deals shall be in one cake.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tammanne naa77u kilo giraame gidiya liiqo xiilliyaa ekkada 12 oittaa uukka.

English Sentences: And thou shalt set them in two rows, six on a row, upon the pure table before the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: He oittata usuppunaa usuppunaa naa77u maaran GODAA sinttan de7iya walahi bainna worqqa xaraphpheezaa bollan wotta.

English Sentences: And thou shalt put pure frankincense upon each row, that it may be on the bread for a memorial, even an offering made by fire unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI taman xuugganau shiishshido qumaa yarshshuwaa gidiyoogaa erissanau, naa77u maaratu lanqqiyan lanqqiyan geeshsha ixaanaa wotta.

English Sentences: Every sabbath he shall set it in order before the LORD continually, being taken from the children of Israel by an everlasting covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha oittaa Sambbatan Sambbatan ubba wode Aarooni GODAA sinttan Israa7eela asaa gishshaa wotto. Hegee Israa7eela asai ubba wode oottanau koshshiya qaalaa maachchaa.

English Sentences: And it shall be Aaron's and his sons'; and they shall eat it in the holy place: for it is most holy unto him of the offerings of the LORD made by fire by a perpetual statute.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee Aaroonassinne a attuma naatussi imetto; i GODAASSI taman xuuggiyo yarshshuwaappe wogaadan Aaroonanne a naata gakkiya ubbaappe aadhdhiya geeshsha shaaho gidiyo gishshau, eti hegaa geeshsha sohuwan moona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the son of an Israelitish woman, whose father was an Egyptian, went out among the children of Israel: and this son of the Israelitish woman and a man of Israel strove together in the camp;
Wolaitta Sentences: Aayen Israa7eela asa, aawan qassi Gibxxe asa gidiya issi bitanee de7ees. Issi gallassi i hara Israa7eela asa gidiya issuwaara heeran warettiis.

English Sentences: And the Israelitish woman's son blasphemed the name of the Lord, and cursed. And they brought him unto Moses: (and his mother's name was Shelomith, the daughter of Dibri, of the tribe of Dan:)
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha ayyo aayyiyaa Israa7eela asa gidido bitanee waretaa giddon GODAA sunttaa cayiis. Yaatin a Muusekko ehiidosona. He bitaniyaa aayyiyaa Daana yaraa gidiya Xiibira na7iyo. I sunttaikka SHalomiito.

English Sentences: And they put him in ward, that the mind of the LORD might be shewed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha bitaniyaa waatanaakko GODAA shenee etayyo qonccana gakkanaashin, eti a qasho keettan wottidosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis,

English Sentences: Bring forth him that hath cursed without the camp; and let all that heard him lay their hands upon his head, and let all the congregation stone him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He cayida bitaniyaa dunkkaanidosaappe gaxi kessa; i cayishin siyida asai ubbai bantta kushiyaa a huuphiyaa bollan wottona; yaatobare Israa7eela asaa maabarai ubbai a shuchchan caddidi woro.

English Sentences: And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel, saying, Whosoever curseth his God shall bear his sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaayyo hagaadan yaagada yoota; Ai asinne ba Xoossaa cayikko, i ba nagaran oishettana.

English Sentences: And he that blasphemeth the name of the LORD, he shall surely be put to death, and all the congregation shall certainly stone him: as well the stranger, as he that is born in the land, when he blasphemeth the name of the Lord, shall be put to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA sunttaa cayiya asi haiqqo; Israa7eela asaa maabarai ubbai a shuchchan caddo. Betidi yiidaagaa gidin woi biitta asa gidinkka GODAA sunttaa cayikko haiqqo.

English Sentences: And he that killeth any man shall surely be put to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Asa woriya asi haiqqo.

English Sentences: And he that killeth a beast shall make it good; beast for beast.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa mehe woriya asi ooninne ba worido mehiyaa gishshaa paxa mehiyaa qanxxo.
