English Sentences: And if a man cause a blemish in his neighbour; as he hath done, so shall it be done to him;
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi asi ba shooruwaa qohikko, i oottidooridan a bollankka oosetto.

English Sentences: Breach for breach, eye for eye, tooth for tooth: as he hath caused a blemish in a man, so shall it be done to him again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Menttikko meqqo; aife gishshaa aife; achcha gishshaa achcha. Asa bollan qohuwaa gattida oonikka i gattido qohuwaa malai a bollankka gakko.

English Sentences: And he that killeth a beast, he shall restore it: and he that killeth a man, he shall be put to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mehe worida asi mehiyaa qanxxo; shin asa worida asi haiqqo.

English Sentences: Ye shall have one manner of law, as well for the stranger, as for one of your own country: for I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Betiyaukka Israa7eela asau higgee issi mala gido; aissi giikko taani GODAA intte Xoossaa yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Moses spake to the children of Israel, that they should bring forth him that had cursed out of the camp, and stone him with stones. And the children of Israel did as the LORD commanded Moses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa ubbaa Muusee Israa7eela asau ubbau yootiis; yootin eti he cayida bitaniyaa dunkkaanidosaappe gaxi kessidi, shuchchan caddidi woridosona. Yaatidi Israa7eela asai GODAI Muusa azazidoogaadan oottidosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses in mount Sinai, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Siinaa Deriyaa bollan GODAI hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, When ye come into the land which I give you, then shall the land keep a sabbath unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni Israa7eela asaassi hagaadan yaagada yoota; Taani intteyyo immiyo biittaa intte geliyo wode, biittaikka GODAA Sambbataa bonchcho.

English Sentences: Six years thou shalt sow thy field, and six years thou shalt prune thy vineyard, and gather in the fruit thereof;
Wolaitta Sentences: Usuppun laittaa kumettaa intte shooqan zerite; qassi usuppun laittaa kumettaakka intte woiniyaa turaa xeeraa xunqqite; a aifiyaakka maxidi ekkite.

English Sentences: But in the seventh year shall be a sabbath of rest unto the land, a sabbath for the LORD: thou shalt neither sow thy field, nor prune thy vineyard.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin laappuntta laittai biittaayyo shemppo Sambbata; hegee GODAAYYOOKKA Sambbata. He laappuntta laittan intte shooqan zeroppite; intte woiniyaa xeeraakka xunqqoppite.

English Sentences: That which groweth of its own accord of thy harvest thou shalt not reap, neither gather the grapes of thy vine undressed: for it is a year of rest unto the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte biittan azabba gididi mokkiyaabakka cakkoppite; qassi xunqqennan de7ishin coo aifida woiniyaakka shiishshoppite. He laittai biittaassi muleera shemppo laittaa gido.

English Sentences: And the sabbath of the land shall be meat for you; for thee, and for thy servant, and for thy maid, and for thy hired servant, and for thy stranger that sojourneth with thee,
Wolaitta Sentences: He Sambbata laittan biittai oosettana xayikkonne intteyyo, intte maccanne attuma ashkkaratuyyo, intteyyo keraa oottiyaageetuyyo, betidi yiidi inttenaara de7iyaageetuyyo, intte mehiyaayyoonne intte biittan de7iya do7atuyyo gidiya qumaa immana; biittai mokkiyoobai ubbai meetetto.

English Sentences: And for thy cattle, and for the beast that are in thy land, shall all the increase thereof be meat.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Laittatu giddon de7iya laappun Sambbatata qooda;

English Sentences: And thou shalt number seven sabbaths of years unto thee, seven times seven years; and the space of the seven sabbaths of years shall be unto thee forty and nine years.
Wolaitta Sentences: laappun Sambbatatu laittaa qoodai laapputoo laappuna; hegeekka oitamanne uddufun laitta.

English Sentences: Then shalt thou cause the trumpet of the jubile to sound on the tenth day of the seventh month, in the day of atonement shall ye make the trumpet sound throughout all your land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, laappuntta aginan, tammantta gallassan bonchchettiya nagaraa atto giissiyo gallassan malkkataa punniya asa intte biittan ubban kiittite.

English Sentences: And ye shall hallow the fiftieth year, and proclaim liberty throughout all the land unto all the inhabitants thereof: it shall be a jubile unto you; and ye shall return every man unto his possession, and ye shall return every man unto his family.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ishatamantto laittaa dummayidi, he biittan de7iya ubbaassi birshshettaa awaajjite. Hegee intteyyo Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalaa. He wodiyan intte ubbaikka intte gadiyaunne intte yarau yarau simmite.

English Sentences: A jubile shall that fiftieth year be unto you: ye shall not sow, neither reap that which groweth of itself in it, nor gather the grapes in it of thy vine undressed.
Wolaitta Sentences: He laittai intteyyo Ishatamantto Laittaa Baala. He laittan zeroppite; azabba gididi mokkidabaakka cakkoppite; qassi intte a xeeraa xunqqennan aifida woiniyaa aifiyaakka shiishshoppite.

English Sentences: For it is the jubile; it shall be holy unto you: ye shall eat the increase thereof out of the field.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee Ishatamantto Laittaa Baala gidiyo gishshau, i intteyyo geeshsha; goyennan coo dembban mokkidabaa miite.

English Sentences: In the year of this jubile ye shall return every man unto his possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalaa wode asi ubbi ba gadiyan simmo.

English Sentences: And if thou sell ought unto thy neighbour, or buyest ought of thy neighbour's hand, ye shall not oppress one another:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte intte shooruwaappe gadiyaa shammikko, woi qassi ayyo baizzikko, issoi issuwaa cimmoppite.

English Sentences: According to the number of years after the jubile thou shalt buy of thy neighbour, and according unto the number of years of the fruits he shall sell unto thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalaappe guyyiyan de7iya laittatu qoodaadan intte shooruwaappe shammite; intte shooroikka qassi gadee kattaa mokkanau de7iyo laittatu qoodaadan baizzo.

English Sentences: According to the multitude of years thou shalt increase the price thereof, and according to the fewness of years thou shalt diminish the price of it: for according to the number of the years of the fruits doth he sell unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laittatu qoodai daro gidikko, waagai darees; laittatu qoodai guuxxikko, waagaikka guuxxees. Aissi giikko, intte cakkana kattaa cahaa qoodaadan intte shooroi intteyyo baizzees.

English Sentences: Ye shall not therefore oppress one another; but thou shalt fear thy God:for I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte issoi issuwaa cimmoppite; shin intte intte Xoossaassi yayyite. Taani GODAI, intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Wherefore ye shall do my statutes, and keep my judgments, and do them; and ye shall dwell in the land in safety.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta azazuwaa oottite; ta higgiyaakka naagitenne oottite; yaatikko intte ha biittan sarotettan de7ana.

English Sentences: And the land shall yield her fruit, and ye shall eat your fill, and dwell therein in safety.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittai ba aifiyaa intteyyo immana; immin intte kallana gakkanaashin maana; qassi he biittankka intte sarotettan de7ana.

English Sentences: And if ye shall say, What shall we eat the seventh year? behold, we shall not sow, nor gather in our increase:
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte, "Nuuni zerana xayikko, qassi kattaakka cakkidi shiishshana xayikko, laappuntta laittan ai maanee?" giikko,

English Sentences: Then I will command my blessing upon you in the sixth year, and it shall bring forth fruit for three years.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani usuppuntta laittan ta anjjuwaa intte bollan kiittana; yaatobare biittai heezzu laittau gidiya aifiyaa aifana.

English Sentences: And ye shall sow the eighth year, and eat yet of old fruit until the ninth year; until her fruits come in ye shall eat of the old store.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hosppuntta laittan intte intte biittan zeriyo wodekka, kase shaachcha kattaa maana; qassi intte zeriyo kattaa aifiyaa uddufuntta laittan shiishshana gakkanaashinkka, shaachcha kattaa maana.

English Sentences: The land shall not be sold for ever: for the land is mine; for ye are strangers and sojourners with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Biittai tabaa gidiyo gishshaunne inttekka ha biittan imattanne bete gididi de7iyo gishshau, biittaa naa77antto simmennaadan baizzoppite.

English Sentences: And in all the land of your possession ye shall grant a redemption for the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte oiqqido biittan ubban de7iya gadiyaa gadiyaawati wozana mala, eta maataa naaganau koshshees.

English Sentences: If thy brother be waxen poor, and hath sold away some of his possession, and if any of his kin come to redeem it, then shall he redeem that which his brother sold.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne ishai hiyyeesidi ba gadiyaappe baizzikko, ayyo matattiya dabboi yiidi, he gadiyaa ayyo wozo.

English Sentences: And if the man have none to redeem it, and himself be able to redeem it;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ayyo he gadiyaa woziya dabboi xayikko, qassi ikka simmi duretidi woziyo miishshaa demmikko,

English Sentences: Then let him count the years of the sale thereof, and restore the overplus unto the man to whom he sold it; that he may return unto his possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: ba baizzido wodiyaappe doommidi de7iya laittaa qoodidi, attida laittaa miishshaa shammidaagaayyo zaaro; yaatidi i ba gadiyau simmo.

English Sentences: But if he be not able to restore it to him, then that which is sold shall remain in the hand of him that hath bought it until the year of jubile: and in the jubile it shall go out, and he shall return unto his possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ayyo he gadiyaa wozanau gidiya miishshi xayikko, Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalai gakkanaashin gadee shammida bitaniyaa kushiyan gam77o; Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalaa wode, a gadee ayyo simmo; ikka ba gadiyau simmo.

English Sentences: And if a man sell a dwelling house in a walled city, then he may redeem it within a whole year after it is sold; within a full year may he redeem it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gimbbetti uttida katamaa giddon issi asi de7iyo keettaa hara urau baizzikko, i baizzoosappe biidi issi laittaa gakkanaashin de7iya wodiyan zaaridi wozanau au maatai de7ees.

English Sentences: And if it be not redeemed within the space of a full year, then the house that is in the walled city shall be established for ever to him that bought it throughout his generations: it shall not go out in the jubile.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi laitta kumettaa giddon wozana xayikko, he gimbbettida katamaa giddon de7iya keettai shammidaagaayyo na7aa na7au merinau abaa gidees. Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalaa wodekka simmenna.

English Sentences: But the houses of the villages which have no wall round about them shall be counted as the fields of the country: they may be redeemed, and they shall go out in the jubile.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin gimbbettibeenna heeratun de7iya keettati shooqa mala. Eti wozettoosona; Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalaa wodekka baizzidaagau simmoosona.

English Sentences: Notwithstanding the cities of the Levites, and the houses of the cities of their possession, may the Levites redeem at any time.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gidikkonne Leewatu katamatun de7iya bantta keettaa Leewati bantta koyido wodiyan wozi ekkanau danddayoosona.

English Sentences: And if a man purchase of the Levites, then the house that was sold, and the city of his possession, shall go out in the year of jubile: for the houses of the cities of the Levites are their possession among the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewatuppe issi asi eta katamaa giddon de7iya keettaa baizzidi wozana xayikko, he eta katamaa giddon de7iya keettai Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalaa wode simmees. Aissi giikko, Leewatu katamaa giddon de7iya keettati Israa7eela asaa giddon Leewatussi aqo.

English Sentences: But the field of the suburbs of their cities may not be sold; for it is their perpetual possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eta katamaa yuushuwan eta ubbaassi issippe de7iya biittai etau merinau aqo gidiyo gishshau baizettenna.

English Sentences: And if thy brother be waxen poor, and fallen in decay with thee; then thou shalt relieve him: yea, though he be a stranger, or a sojourner; that he may live with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi ne ishai hiyyeesidi bana danddayana xayikko, imattadaaninne betedan i nenaara de7ana mala, neeni a maadda.

English Sentences: Take thou no usury of him, or increase: but fear thy God; that thy brother may live with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ishaa nenaara wottanau appe dichchaa ekkoppa; woikko wore mooppa. SHin neeni ne Xoossaassi yayya.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not give him thy money upon usury, nor lend him thy victuals for increase.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne biraa ayyo dichchau tal77oppa; ne qumaakka ayyo woriyan baizzoppa.

English Sentences: I am the LORD your God, which brought you forth out of the land of Egypt, to give you the land of Canaan, and to be your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteyyo Kanaane biittaa immanaunne intte Xoossaa gidanau, inttena Gibxxe biittaappe kessidaagee, taani GODAI, intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: And if thy brother that dwelleth by thee be waxen poor, and be sold unto thee; thou shalt not compel him to serve as a bondservant:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeyyo dabbo gidiya Israa7eela asi hiyyeesidi, bana neeyyo ailletettau baizzikko, neeni a ailledan ootissoppa.

English Sentences: But as an hired servant, and as a sojourner, he shall be with thee, and shall serve thee unto the year of jubile:
Wolaitta Sentences: I keraa oottiya asadaaninne betedan nenaara de7o; Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalai gakkanaashin i neeyyo ootto.

English Sentences: And then shall he depart from thee, both he and his children with him, and shall return unto his own family, and unto the possession of his fathers shall he return.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode i ba naatuurakka issippe ne sooppe kiyidi ba keettaa asaakko bo; ba aawaa gadiyaakkokka simmo.

English Sentences: For they are my servants, which I brought forth out of the land of Egypt: they shall not be sold as bondmen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eelati taani Gibxxe biittaappe kessido ta ailleta gidiyo gishshau, eti ailletettau baizettoppona.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not rule over him with rigour; but shalt fear thy God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni eta meqettaa iitada haaroppa; shin neeni ne Xoossau yayya.

English Sentences: Both thy bondmen, and thy bondmaids, which thou shalt have, shall be of the heathen that are round about you; of them shall ye buy bondmen and bondmaids.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeyyo attumanne macca ailleti de7ana mala koyikko, ne yuushuwan de7iya kawotettatuppe shamma.

English Sentences: Moreover of the children of the strangers that do sojourn among you, of them shall ye buy, and of their families that are with you, which they begat in your land: and they shall be your possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi intte biittan de7iya betetuppenne intte biittan de7ishin yelettida eta so asaappe shammanau danddayeeta; eti intteyyo aqo gidona.

English Sentences: And ye shall take them as an inheritance for your children after you, to inherit them for a possession; they shall be your bondmen for ever: but over your brethren the children of Israel, ye shall not rule one over another with rigour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteppe guyyiyan intte naati eta merinau laattana mala, intte naatuyyo immite. Intte etappe ubba wodekka aille shammanau danddayeeta; shin intte isha gidiya Israa7eela asa meqettaa iitidi haaroppite.

English Sentences: And if a sojourner or stranger wax rich by thee, and thy brother that dwelleth by him wax poor, and sell himself unto the stranger or sojourner by thee, or to the stock of the stranger's family:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne matan de7iya imatta woikko bete asi

English Sentences: After that he is sold he may be redeemed again; one of his brethren may redeem him:
Wolaitta Sentences: duretin, qassi a matan de7iya ne ishai hiyyeesidi, he ne matan de7iya imattaassi woikko betiyaassi woi imatta bitaniyaa zariyaappe issuwaassi bana baizzikko, i baizetti simmin a wozanau danddayettees; a ishanttuppe issoi a wozo.

English Sentences: Either his uncle, or his uncle's son, may redeem him, or any that is nigh of kin unto him of his family may redeem him; or if he be able, he may redeem himself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woi a aawaa ishai, woi a aawaa ishaa na7ai a wozo; woi a yaraappe ayyo mata dabbo gidiya asi a wozo; woi qassi i ba huuphiyau duretikko i bana wozo.

English Sentences: And he shall reckon with him that bought him from the year that he was sold to him unto the year of jubile: and the price of his sale shall be according unto the number of years, according to the time of an hired servant shall it be with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: I bana shammida bitaniyaara issippe gididi, i bana baizzido laittaappe doommidi Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalai gakkanaashin de7iya laittaa qoodo; a birshshissiya waagai he laittaa qoodaa keena gido. I bana shammidaagaara gam77ido wodiyaa waagai issi asi keraa oottidi demmiyo miishsha lagge gido.

English Sentences: If there be yet many years behind, according unto them he shall give again the price of his redemption out of the money that he was bought for.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalai gakkanau biron daro laittai attidabaa gidikko, ba baizettido waagaappe he laittaa qoodan bana woziyo waagaa qanxxo.

English Sentences: And if there remain but few years unto the year of jubile, then he shall count with him, and according unto his years shall he give him again the price of his redemption.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalai gakkanau attida laittai guutta gidikko, bana shammidaagaara issippe qoodidi, he laittaa qoodan bana woziyo waagaa qanxxo.

English Sentences: And as a yearly hired servant shall he be with him: and the other shall not rule with rigour over him in thy sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: I laittan laittan kera oottiya asadan bana shammidaagaara de7oppe attin, intte xeelliiddi Israa7eela asa gidiya bitaniyaa meqettaa iitidi haaroppite.

English Sentences: And if he be not redeemed in these years, then he shall go out in the year of jubile, both he, and his children with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin i hegaa mala ogiyan wozettana xayikko, Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalai gakkiyo wode inne a naati ashkkaratettaappe kiyona.

English Sentences: For unto me the children of Israel are servants; they are my servants whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt: I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Israa7eela asai ta ashkkaratattenne; taani Gibxxe biittaappe kessido ta ashkkarata. Taani, GODAI, intte Xoossaa yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Ye shall make you no idols nor graven image, neither rear you up a standing image, neither shall ye set up any image of stone in your land, to bow down unto it: for I am the LORD your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Intte etayyo goinnanau eeqata medhdhoppite; qassi hawulttiyaa, masettida misiliyaa woikko masettida shuchchaa essoppite. Taani, GODAI, intte Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Ye shall keep my sabbaths, and reverence my sanctuary: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta Sambbatata naagite; ta Dunkkaaniyaa bonchchite; taani GODAA.

English Sentences: If ye walk in my statutes, and keep my commandments, and do them;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte ta higgiyan biikko, ta azazotakka naagikkonne oottikko,

English Sentences: Then I will give you rain in due season, and the land shall yield her increase, and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani intteyyo iraa wodiyan bukissana; biittaikka kattaa darissidi mokkana; dembbaa mittatikka aifiyaa aifana.

English Sentences: And your threshing shall reach unto the vintage, and the vintage shall reach unto the sowing time: and ye shall eat your bread to the full, and dwell in your land safely.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte kattaa qoxxiyo wodiyaappe biidi woiniyaa aifiyaa maxiyo wodee gakkanaashin kattaa qoxxana; qassi woiniyaa aifiyaa maxoikka biidi kattaa zeriyo wodee gakkanaashin wurenna. Intte kallana gakkanaashin qumaa maana; qassi intte intte biittankka saruwan de7ana.

English Sentences: And I will give peace in the land, and ye shall lie down, and none shall make you afraid: and I will rid evil beasts out of the land, neither shall the sword go through your land.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani biittau sarotettaa immana; ooninne yashissennan intte zin77ana. Iita do7ata taani biittaappe xaissana; intte biittan naa77antto olai denddenna.

English Sentences: And ye shall chase your enemies, and they shall fall before you by the sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte morkketa intte yedettana; yedettin intte sinttan eti bisuwan haiqqana.

English Sentences: And five of you shall chase an hundred, and an hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight: and your enemies shall fall before you by the sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteppe ichchashai xeetaa yedettana; qassi xeetai tammu sha7aa yedettana. Intte morkketi intte sinttan bisuwan haiqqana.

English Sentences: For I will have respect unto you, and make you fruitful, and multiply you, and establish my covenant with you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani ta sinttaa inttekko zaarana; zaarada inttena aifissana; inttena darissana. Qassi taani ta maachchaa inttenaara minttana.

English Sentences: And ye shall eat old store, and bring forth the old because of the new.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte shaachcha kattaa maana; qassi ha laitta kattaa wottanau, shaachcha kattaa diggidi sohuwaa kessana.

English Sentences: And I will set my tabernacle among you: and my soul shall not abhor you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta de7iyo sohuwaa intte giddon oottana; taani inttena shenetikke.

English Sentences: And I will walk among you, and will be your God, and ye shall be my people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intte gidduwan hemettana; qassi intte Xoossaa gidana; inttekka ta asa gidana.

English Sentences: I am the LORD your God, which brought you forth out of the land of Egypt, that ye should not be their bondmen; and I have broken the bands of your yoke, and made you go upright.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte Gibxxetuyyo aille gidennaadan, Gibxxe biittaappe inttena kessidaagee taani GODAI intte Xoossaa. Taani intte ailletettaa qambbaraa menttaas; qassi inttekka xoqqu giidi hemettanaadan oottaas.

English Sentences: But if ye will not hearken unto me, and will not do all these commandments;
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin intte taani giyoobaa siyennan ixxikkonne, ha azazota ubbaakka oottennan ixxikko,

English Sentences: And if ye shall despise my statutes, or if your soul abhor my judgments, so that ye will not do all my commandments, but that ye break my covenant:
Wolaitta Sentences: ta wogaa intte karikko, qassi ta azazota ubbaa oottennan ixxidi ta maachchaa kanttanau intte ta higgiyaa shenetikko,

English Sentences: I also will do this unto you; I will even appoint over you terror, consumption, and the burning ague, that shall consume the eyes, and cause sorrow of heart: and ye shall sow your seed in vain, for your enemies shall eat it.
Wolaitta Sentences: he wode taani intte bolli hagaa oottana: Intte akeekennan de7ishin yashshaa, gilqqatettaa, intte aifiyaa jallettiyaanne inttena keehippe harggissiya mishuwaa intte bolli ehaana. Intte zerettaa zerana; shin i hada; aissi giikko, hegaa intte morkketi maana.

English Sentences: And I will set my face against you, and ye shall be slain before your enemies: they that hate you shall reign over you; and ye shall flee when none pursueth you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta som77uwaa intte bolli tukkana; intte morkketu sinttan intte kunddana; inttena ixxiyaageeti inttena haarana; qassi ooninne yedettennan intte baqatana.

English Sentences: And if ye will not yet for all this hearken unto me, then I will punish you seven times more for your sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hagaa ubbaa oottinkka intte tana siyennan ixxikko, taani intte nagaraa gishshau intte qixaatiyaa laappun dakko gujjana.

English Sentences: And I will break the pride of your power; and I will make your heaven as iron, and your earth as brass:
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte wolqqaa otoruwaa taani menttana; saluwaa birata mala oottana; intte biittaakka nahaasiyaa giyo birataa mala oottana.

English Sentences: And your strength shall be spent in vain: for your land shall not yield her increase, neither shall the trees of the land yield their fruits.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte wolqqai hadasan wurana; aissi giikko, intte biittai kattaa mokkenna; biittan de7iya mittatikka aifiyaa aifokkona.

English Sentences: And if ye walk contrary unto me, and will not hearken unto me; I will bring seven times more plagues upon you according to your sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte taayyo ixxis giikkonne taani giyoobaakka siyennan ixxikko, intte nagaraa keena laappun dakko boshaa taani intte bollan ehaana.

English Sentences: I will also send wild beasts among you, which shall rob you of your children, and destroy your cattle, and make you few in number; and your high ways shall be desolate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intte bolli bazzo do7ata yeddana; eti intte naata bonqqana; intte meheta xaissana; intte qoodaakka guuttana; hegaa gaasuwan intte hemettiyo ogee bazzo gidana.

English Sentences: And if ye will not be reformed by me by these things, but will walk contrary unto me;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha ubba qixaatiyankka intte taakko simmennan ixxis giidi biikko,

English Sentences: Then will I also walk contrary unto you, and will punish you yet seven times for your sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: he wode tankka intteyyo ixxis gaana; qassi intte nagaraa gishshau taani ta huuphen inttena laappun dakkuwaa qaxxayana.

English Sentences: And I will bring a sword upon you, that shall avenge the quarrel of my covenant: and when ye are gathered together within your cities, I will send the pestilence among you; and ye shall be delivered into the hand of the enemy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta maachchaa menttido haluwaa kiyiya bisuwaa taani intte bolli ehaana; intte intte katamatun shiiqikkokka, taani intte bollan boshaa yeddana. Qassi inttekka intte morkketu kushiyan aadhdhidi imettana.

English Sentences: And when I have broken the staff of your bread, ten women shall bake your bread in one oven, and they shall deliver you your bread again by weight: and ye shall eat, and not be satisfied.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte kattaa taani xaissiyo wode, tammu maccaasati issi bashiyan oittaa uukkana; hegaakka meezaanan likkidi shaakkana; intte hegaa maana, shin kallekketa.

English Sentences: And if ye will not for all this hearken unto me, but walk contrary unto me;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha ubbankka intte taani giyoobaa siyennan ixxis giidi biikko,

English Sentences: Then I will walk contrary unto you also in fury; and I, even I, will chastise you seven times for your sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: he wode tankka intte bolli hanqquwan denddana; intte nagaraa gishshau taani ta huuphen inttena laappun dakkuwaa qaxxayana.

English Sentences: And ye shall eat the flesh of your sons, and the flesh of your daughters shall ye eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte intte attuma naatunne intte macca naatu ashuwaa maana.

English Sentences: And I will destroy your high places, and cut down your images, and cast your carcases upon the carcases of your idols, and my soul shall abhor you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte goinniyo xoqqa sohota taani kolana; intte ixaanaa yarshshiyo sohuwaakka xaissana. Taani intte ahaa intte eeqatu ahaa bollan olana; taani inttena mule shenetana.

English Sentences: And I will make your cities waste, and bring your sanctuaries unto desolation, and I will not smell the savour of your sweet odours.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intte katamata baisa oottana; intte goinniyo sohotakka kolerettana; intte sawiya yarshshuwaakka singgikke.

English Sentences: And I will bring the land into desolation: and your enemies which dwell therein shall be astonished at it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani intte biittaa xaissana; yaatobare he intte biittan yiidi uttiya morkketikka hegan garamettana.

English Sentences: And I will scatter you among the heathen, and will draw out a sword after you: and your land shall be desolate, and your cities waste.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena kawotettatu giddon laalana; intte bollankka ta bisuwaa shoddana. Intte biittai bayana; intte katamatikka baisa gidana.

English Sentences: Then shall the land enjoy her sabbaths, as long as it lieth desolate, and ye be in your enemies' land; even then shall the land rest, and enjoy her sabbaths.
Wolaitta Sentences: He intte intte morkketu biittan de7iyo wode, baisa gigidi coo de7iya intte biittai ba Sambbatata bonchchiiddi ufaittana. He wode intte biittai shemppananne ba Sambbatata bonchchiiddi ufaittana.

English Sentences: As long as it lieth desolate it shall rest; because it did not rest in your sabbaths, when ye dwelt upon it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte he biittan de7ido wodiyan ubban intte Sambbatatun demmibeenna shemppuwaa ha77i bayidi coo de7iyo wodiyan demmana.

English Sentences: And upon them that are left alive of you I will send a faintness into their hearts in the lands of their enemies; and the sound of a shaken leaf shall chase them; and they shall flee, as fleeing from a sword; and they shall fall when none pursueth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte intte morkketu biittan de7iyo wode, intteppe shaahettidi guyye attidaageeti de7iyaageetu wozanan taani yashshaa yeddana; carkkoi qaattiyo bonccuwaa cenggurssai eta shabbirana; eti bisuwaappe baqatiyaabadan baqatana; qassi eta ooninne yedettennan eti kunddana.

English Sentences: And they shall fall one upon another, as it were before a sword, when none pursueth: and ye shall have no power to stand before your enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttena yedettiyaabi bainnan de7ishin, intte olaappe baqatiyaabadan issoi issuwaara xubettana; qassi intte intte morkketu sinttan eqqanaukka intteyyo aiba wolqqinne de7enna.

English Sentences: And ye shall perish among the heathen, and the land of your enemies shall eat you up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte kawotettatu giddon bayana; intte morkketu biittaikka inttena mitti aggana.

English Sentences: And they that are left of you shall pine away in their iniquity in your enemies' lands; and also in the iniquities of their fathers shall they pine away with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteppe shaahettidi intte morkketu biittan attidaageeti bantta nagaraa gaasuwaaninne bantta aawatu nagaraa gaasuwan gilqqana.

English Sentences: If they shall confess their iniquity, and the iniquity of their fathers, with their trespass which they trespassed against me, and that also they have walked contrary unto me;
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin eti taani etau ixxis gaanaadaaninne eta morkketu biittau eta yeddanaadan oottida bantta nagaraa, bantta maizza aawatu nagaraa, eti tana cimmido cimuwaanne eti taayyo ixxis giidoogaa paaxikko,

English Sentences: And that I also have walked contrary unto them, and have brought them into the land of their enemies; if then their uncircumcised hearts be humbled, and they then accept of the punishment of their iniquity:
Wolaitta Sentences: hegan qassi eta azazettenna wozanaikka ziqqi giikkonne eti bantta nagaraa qixaatiyaa ekkikko,

English Sentences: Then will I remember my covenant with Jacob, and also my covenant with Isaac, and also my covenant with Abraham will I remember; and I will remember the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: he wode taani Yaaqoobaara maacettido ta maachchaa hassayana; qassi Yisaaqaaranne Abrahaamaara maacettido ta maachchaa hassayana; biittaakka hassayana.

English Sentences: The land also shall be left of them, and shall enjoy her sabbaths, while she lieth desolate without them: and they shall accept of the punishment of their iniquity: because, even because they despised my judgments, and because their soul abhorred my statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti xayiichchin, eta biittai baisa attana; he eti xayin baisa gididi coo de7iyo wodiyan biittai ba Sambbatata bonchchiiddi ufaittana. Eti ta azazuwaa karido gishshaunne eta shemppoikka ta wogaa shenetido gishshau, eti bantta nagaraa qixaatiyaa ekkana.

English Sentences: And yet for all that, when they be in the land of their enemies, I will not cast them away, neither will I abhor them, to destroy them utterly, and to break my covenant with them: for I am the LORD their God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gidikkonne eti bantta morkketu biittan de7iyo wode, eti muleera xayana gakkanaashiininne etaara de7iya ta maachchaakka kanttana gakkanaashin, taani eta olikke; qassi shenetikke. Taani, GODAI, eta Xoossaa.

English Sentences: But I will for their sakes remember the covenant of their ancestors, whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt in the sight of the heathen, that I might be their God: I am the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta Xoossaa gidanau, kawotettati xeellishin, Gibxxe biittaappe kessido eta maizza aawatuura taani maacettido maachchaa eta gishshau hassayana. Taani GODAA.

English Sentences: These are the statutes and judgments and laws, which the LORD made between him and the children of Israel in mount Sinai by the hand of Moses.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI Siinaa Deriyaa bollan Muuse baggaara baappenne Israa7eela asaappe gidduwan wottido wogati, azazotinne higgeti hageeta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, When a man shall make a singular vow, the persons shall be for the LORD by thy estimation.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asaassi hagaadan yaagada yoota; Issi asi GODAAYYO asa immanau shiiqikko, neeni gammatiyoogaadan he asa gishshaa miishshaa qanxxo.

English Sentences: And thy estimation shall be of the male from twenty years old even unto sixty years old, even thy estimation shall be fifty shekels of silver, after the shekel of the sanctuary.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne laatamu laittappe biidi usuppun tammu laitta gakkanau de7iya attumaagau usuppun xeetu giraame deexxiya xaqara biraa qanxxo.

English Sentences: And if it be a female, then thy estimation shall be thirty shekels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Macca asa gidikko qassi hasttamu xaqara biraa qanxxo.

English Sentences: And if it be from five years old even unto twenty years old, then thy estimation shall be of the male twenty shekels, and for the female ten shekels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi ichchashu laittappe biidi laatamu laitta gakkanau de7iya attumaagau laatamu xaqara biraanne maccaarissi tammu xaqara biraa qanxxo.

English Sentences: And if it be from a month old even unto five years old, then thy estimation shall be of the male five shekels of silver, and for the female thy estimation shall be three shekels of silver.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka issi aginaappe biidi ichchashu laitta gakkanau de7iya attumaagau ichchashu xaqara biraanne maccaarissi heezzu xaqara biraa qanxxo.

English Sentences: And if it be from sixty years old and above; if it be a male, then thy estimation shall be fifteen shekels, and for the female ten shekels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka qassi usuppun tammu laittanne hegaappe bollaara de7iya attumaagau tammanne ichchashu xaqara biraanne maccaarissi tammu xaqara biraa qanxxo.

English Sentences: But if he be poorer than thy estimation, then he shall present himself before the priest, and the priest shall value him; according to his ability that vowed shall the priest value him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi shiiqettida bitanee neeni gammatidoogaa qanxxanau danddayenna daro manqqo gidikko, i ba shiiquwaa gattanau immido asa ehiidi qeesiyaa sinttan esso; essobare shiiqettida bitanee qanxxanau danddayiyoogaa keenaa qoppidi qeesee gammato.

English Sentences: And if it be a beast, whereof men bring an offering unto the LORD, all that any man giveth of such unto the LORD shall be holy.
Wolaitta Sentences: "I shiiqettidoogee asi GODAASSI yarshshiyoosaa mala mehiyaa yarshshanaassa gidikko, hegaa mala asi GODAASSI immiyo mehee ubbai geeshsha.

English Sentences: He shall not alter it, nor change it, a good for a bad, or a bad for a good: and if he shall at all change beast for beast, then it and the exchange thereof shall be holy.
Wolaitta Sentences: I he mehiyaa gishshaa hara mehiyaa immoppo; woi a hara mehiyaara laammoppo. Lo77uwaa iitaara woi qassi iitaakka lo77uwaara laammoppo; shin i laammikko, koiro meheenne laamiyaa immido meheenne naa77aikka geeshsha.

English Sentences: And if it be any unclean beast, of which they do not offer a sacrifice unto the LORD, then he shall present the beast before the priest:
Wolaitta Sentences: I shiiqettido mehee GODAASSI yarshsho oottidi shiishshanau geeshsha gidenna mehe gidikko, he bitanee he mehiyaa qeesiyaa sintti eho.

English Sentences: And the priest shall value it, whether it be good or bad: as thou valuest it, who art the priest, so shall it be.
Wolaitta Sentences: Lo77o gidin iita gidin, qeesee he mehiyaa gammato; yaatobare qeesee gammatidoogee a waaga gido.

English Sentences: But if he will at all redeem it, then he shall add a fifth part thereof unto thy estimation.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he mehiyaa godai a zaaridi wozanau koyikko, he mehiyaa waagaa bolli xeetaappe laatamu kushiyaa gujjo.

English Sentences: And when a man shall sanctify his house to be holy unto the LORD, then the priest shall estimate it, whether it be good or bad: as the priest shall estimate it, so shall it stand.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi asi ba keettaa geeshsha gidanaadan GODAASSI dummayikko, lo77o gidin iita gidin, qeesee he keettaa gammato. Yaatobare qeesee gammatidoogaadan a waagai hegaadankka gido.

English Sentences: And if he that sanctified it will redeem his house, then he shall add the fifth part of the money of thy estimation unto it, and it shall be his.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi ba keettaa GODAASSI geeshsha ootti dummayida asi zaarettidi wozanau koyikko, he keettaa waagaa bollan xeetaappe laatamu kushiyaa gujjo; yaatobare keettai assa gidees.

English Sentences: And if a man shall sanctify unto the LORD some part of a field of his possession, then thy estimation shall be according to the seed thereof: an homer of barley seed shall be valued at fifty shekels of silver.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi asi ba laata gadiyaappe shaakkidi geeshsha ootti GODAASSI dummayikko, he gadiyaa waagai an zeriyo zerettan gammatetto. Hegeenne laatamu kilo giraame banggaa zeriyo keena shooqa gidikko, tammu xaqara biraa qanxxo.

English Sentences: If he sanctify his field from the year of jubile, according to thy estimation it shall stand.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba gadiyaa Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalaappe doommidi geeshsha ootti GODAASSI dummayikko, he gadiyau kumetta waagaa qanxxo.

English Sentences: But if he sanctify his field after the jubile, then the priest shall reckon unto him the money according to the years that remain, even unto the year of the jubile, and it shall be abated from thy estimation.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i ba gadiyaa Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalai aadhdhi simmin geeshsha ootti GODAASSI dummayikko, kaallidi de7iya Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalai gakkanaashin de7iya wodiyaa qeesee qoodo; yaatobare a kumetta waagaappe wodhdhees.

English Sentences: And if he that sanctified the field will in any wise redeem it, then he shall add the fifth part of the money of thy estimation unto it, and it shall be assured to him.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gadiyaa geeshsha ootti GODAASSI dummayida asi zaaretti wozanau koyikko, i gammatettido miishshaa bolli xeetaappe laatamu kushiyaa gujjo; yaatobare gadee simmidi abaa gidees.

English Sentences: And if he will not redeem the field, or if he have sold the field to another man, it shall not be redeemed any more.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i gadiyaa zaarettidi, wozanaappe kasetidi hara asau baizzikko, he gadiyaa wozanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: But the field, when it goeth out in the jubile, shall be holy unto the LORD, as a field devoted; the possession thereof shall be the priest's.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalai gakkin gadee yedettiyo wode, he gadee naa77antto guyye ekkennabaadan GODAASSI geeshsha gidees. He aqoi qeesiyaassa.

English Sentences: And if a man sanctify unto the LORD a field which he hath bought, which is not of the fields of his possession;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi asi hara asappe shammido gadiyaa geeshsha ootti GODAASSI dummayanau koyikko,

English Sentences: Then the priest shall reckon unto him the worth of thy estimation, even unto the year of the jubile: and he shall give thine estimation in that day, as a holy thing unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: kaalliya Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalai gakkanaashin de7iya waagaa qeesee gammato; gammatobare bitanee he gallassikka he gimmitiyaa qanxxo; qanxxobare he miishshai GODAASSI dummatida miishsha gidana.

English Sentences: In the year of the jubile the field shall return unto him of whom it was bought, even to him to whom the possession of the land did belong.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ishatamantto Laittaa Baalai gakkiyo wode, he gadee koiro laatan ekkidi baizzida bitaniyaassi simmees.

English Sentences: And all thy estimations shall be according to the shekel of the sanctuary: twenty gerahs shall be the shekel.
Wolaitta Sentences: "A waagai Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyan eriyo meezaanan gammatettees.

English Sentences: Only the firstling of the beasts, which should be the LORD's firstling, no man shall sanctify it; whether it be ox, or sheep: it is the LORD's.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin ooninne baira yelettida mehe GODAASSI dummayidi shiishshanau danddayenna; aissi giikko, i kasekka GODAABAA. Miizza mara gidin woi dorssa mara gidinkka i GODAABAA.

English Sentences: And if it be of an unclean beast, then he shall redeem it according to thine estimation, and shall add a fifth part of it thereto: or if it be not redeemed, then it shall be sold according to thy estimation.
Wolaitta Sentences: He marai geeshsha gidana xayikko, ne gammatido waagaa bolli xeetaappe laatamu kushiyaa gujjidi a godai zaarettidi wozo. I wozana xayikko, ne gammatido waagan hara asau baizetto.

English Sentences: Notwithstanding no devoted thing, that a man shall devote unto the LORD of all that he hath, both of man and beast, and of the field of his possession, shall be sold or redeemed: every devoted thing is most holy unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi asi babaappe GODAASSI dummayidi immidobai aiba gidikkokka, asa gidin mehe gidin, woi a laatan gakkida gade gidinkka, baizettennanne wozettenna. Dummayidobai ubbabi GODAASSI ubbaappe aadhdhida geeshsha.

English Sentences: None devoted, which shall be devoted of men, shall be redeemed; but shall surely be put to death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa giddoppe shaahettidi xayanaadan imettida asi wozettoppo; he asi haiqqo.

English Sentences: And all the tithe of the land, whether of the seed of the land, or of the fruit of the tree, is the LORD's: it is holy unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Biittaa asiratai ubbai biittaappe mokkida katta gidin woi mitta aife gidinkka GODAASSA. Hegee GODAASSI geeshsha.

English Sentences: And if a man will at all redeem ought of his tithes, he shall add thereto the fifth part thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi asi ba asirataa wozanau koyikko, a waagaa bollan xeetaappe laatamu kushiyaa gujjo.

English Sentences: And concerning the tithe of the herd, or of the flock, even of whatsoever passeth under the rod, the tenth shall be holy unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Miizzaa asirataa gidin, dorssaa asirataa gidin, woi deeshshaa asirata gidinkka, henttanchchaa gatimaappe garssaara aadhdhiya augeenne tammaappe issoi GODAASSI geeshsha.

English Sentences: He shall not search whether it be good or bad, neither shall he change it: and if he change it at all, then both it and the change thereof shall be holy; it shall not be redeemed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammantta mehiyaa iita gidin lo77o gidinkka dooroppo; woi a haraara laammoppo. Laammikkonne koiroogeenne laamiyaa immidoogeenne naa77aikka GODAASSI geeshsha gidoosonappe attin, zaaridi wozanau danddayenna yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: These are the commandments, which the LORD commanded Moses for the children of Israel in mount Sinai.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siinaa Deriyaa bollan GODAI Muuse baggaara Israa7eela asaa azazido azazoti hageeta.
